Francais: Il eut trente fils; il maria trente filles hors de sa maison, et il fit venir du dehors trente filles pour ses fils.
Anglais: And he had thirty sons, and thirty daughters, whom he sent abroad, and took in thirty daughters from abroad for his sons. And he judged Israel seven years.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam vuɗ guro sa jufayn dok-hidi, vuɗ sa boyn dok-hidi lay. Sa boyn nam vulsi goy kuɗ sum sara'a, jar sum sa goyna nam yaw guro-boyn dok-ɦidi mi gurona valamu.
Bulu: A nga bili bobefam mewôm mela a bobebinga mewôm mela; a nga mane ve be meluk atan, avale fe a nga soo bengo be binga mewôm mela yʼatan asu bobefame bé. A mbe ntyiʼi mejô Israél tañe mimbu zañgbwa;
Guiziga: Ibisaŋ naŋ ti ziri mizilehey kukur makir waɗ mongosohoy kukur makir ma. A vula ziri mongoso naŋhay da mizli ngi sukwi mekelem ɓa a ɗuv taŋ, yo a ɗuva da ziri naŋ mizileheye kwana, i ziri ngi vrahay aya ya. A ga kiita da Israyele hã vi tarnaˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe cappanɗe tato e ɓiɓɓe rewɓe cappanɗe tato. O te'ni ɓiɓɓe maako rewɓe haa worɓe ɓe ngonaay danygol maako. O te'ani ɓiɓɓe maako worɓe boo rewɓe ɓe ngonaay danygol maako. O alkaaliijo Isra'iila duuɓi joweeɗiɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: O woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe cappanɗe tato e ɓiɓɓe rewɓe cappanɗe tato. O te'ni ɓiɓɓe maako rewɓe haa worɓe ɓe ngonaay danygol maako. O te'ani ɓiɓɓe maako worɓe boo rewɓe ɓe ngonaay danygol maako. O alkaaliijo Isra'iila duuɓi joweeɗiɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ibsaŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ be-wiwii ɓu-taar in o be-okoo ɓu-taar mbɛt. A̧ ha̧a̧ o be-okoo kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ kóò ha̧ o ŋma gɔni-duk, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛɛ kai o zɔŋa gɔni-duk nɛ kóò ha̧ o be-wiwii kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ duka zu o be  Israɛl  pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ibsaŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ be-wiwii ɓu-taar in o be-okoo ɓu-taar mbɛt. A̧ ha̧a̧ o be-okoo kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ kóò ha̧ o ŋma gɔni-duk, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛɛ kai o zɔŋa gɔni-duk nɛ kóò ha̧ o be-wiwii kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ duka zu o be  Israɛl  pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Mahekenemsə ŋwale tezhili mahekenemsə ŋwalea kwɛ ve. Mbe ve nda ŋwalea kwɛa ŋkɛ ŋkɛ ke mbeli nyi keɗema kahwelefe ta ŋkɛ. Nyi kazhili ɓiyitsa ne, kakele mi hɛ se hwa kweci hwelefefi tekeleke. Kande meha ghwə ta ka Israyɛl ŋkɛ kava mberefaŋe.
Tupurri: Se biñ weere ma twerpiir do swa' lay, ma tnaare do swa' lay. Se kal haç mayren wo wo go ti äï¡ï¡ni ma tigriñ wo day se hoo mayre ma ti äï¡ï¡ni ma tigriñ wo le do swa' ne weere äen wo lay. Se joñ car kiida jar Israyel wo nen kiñgi renam.

Francais: Il fut juge en Israël pendant sept ans; ensuite Abesan mourant et fut enterré à Bethléem.
Anglais: Then died Ibzan, and was buried at Beth–lehem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ka kitata vi sa Israyella ir busat siɗiya. Bugol kayni Ibsan mita, nisi pum hay Betlehem.
Bulu: éyoñe te a nga wu a jambe e Bétléhém.
Guiziga: Ibisaŋ a muc, a dikakaŋ a Betelyem.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o maayi, ɓe uwi mo haa Baytilaama.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o maayi, ɓe uwi mo haa Baytilaama.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ibsaŋ fea ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn Bɛtlɛhɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ibsaŋ fea ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn Bɛtlɛhɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mtenyɛ, pa mbeli lamte ŋkɛ kwa Bɛtelɛhɛm.
Tupurri: Ibsan kal hugi go aè teen go Betlehem.

Francais: Après lui, Ahialon, de Zabulon, fut juge en Israël; il fut juge en Israël pendant dix ans;
Anglais: And after him Elon, a Zebulunite, judged Israel; and he judged Israel ten years.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol Ibsan, Elon ma hay jafna vi Zabulon ka kitata vi sa Israyella. Nam ka kitata visi ir busat doogo.
Bulu: Elôn ya Zabuloñ nyʼa nga tôñe valé. A nga bo ntyiʼi mejô yʼIsraél tañe mimbu awôm;
Guiziga: A dirba Eloŋ mbur Zabuloŋ, mici ar li naŋ ngi ga kiita da Israyeleye, a ga kiita da Israyeleye hã vi kuruˀu.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo maayde Ibsaan, Elon mo lenyol Zabulon laati alkaaliijo Isra'iila, duuɓi sappo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo maayde Ibsaan, Elon mo lenyol Zabulon laati alkaaliijo Isra'iila, duuɓi sappo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ Ibsaŋ nɛ́ Elɔŋ be Zabulɔŋ a̧ ɔɔ wan zu  Israɛl . A̧ duka zu  Israɛl  tɛ pɛ ɓu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ Ibsaŋ nɛ́ Elɔŋ be Zabulɔŋ a̧ ɔɔ wan zu  Israɛl . A̧ duka zu  Israɛl  tɛ pɛ ɓu.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta Ibsan, Ɛlon hwelefe ta Zabəlon, ya kande meha ghwə te ghəa ka Israyɛl kava meŋe.
Tupurri: Blam äe mono, Elon ma ti sir Sabuloñ kol car kiida jar Israyel wo, se joñ car kiida jar Israyel wo nen kiñgi hwale.

Francais: puis Ahialon, de Zabulon, mourut et fut enterré à Ajalon, dans le pays de Zabulon.
Anglais: And Elon the Zebulunite died, and was buried in Aijalon in the country of Zebulun.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol kayni nam mita. Nisi pum hay Ayalon, hay nagata vi Zabulon.
Bulu: éyoñe te a nga wu a jambe Ayalôn, e sii Zabuloñ.
Guiziga: Eloŋ mbur Zabuloŋ tuwa, a mucu, a dikaka daˀ a Eloŋ hirwuy Zabuloŋ vuna si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o maayi, ɓe uwi mo haa Eloon haa Ayyalon nder lesdi Zabulon.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o maayi, ɓe uwi mo haa Eloon haa Ayyalon nder lesdi Zabulon.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Elɔŋ fea ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn Elɔŋ nú Zabulɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Elɔŋ fea ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn Elɔŋ nú Zabulɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ɛlon mtenyɛ, pa mbeli lamte ŋkɛ mbe Ayalon te hɛɗia Zabəlon.
Tupurri: Se kal hugi go, aè teen wo go Ayalon äil sir Sabuloñ.

Francais: Après lui, Abdon, fils d'Illel, de Pharathon fut juge en Israël.
Anglais: And after him Abdon the son of Hillel, a Pirathonite, judged Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolom namu, Abdon goora vi Hilel ma Piratonna, ka kitata vi sa Israyella.
Bulu: Môt a nga tôñe Elôn a mbe Abdôn, e mona Hilél, mone Piratônite.
Guiziga: A dirba Eloŋ, i Abudoŋ mangal ngi Hilel, mbur Piratoŋ miga kiita da Israyeleye.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo maayde Elon, Abdon ɓii Hillel, goɗɗo Piraton laati alkaaliijo Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo maayde Elon, Abdon ɓii Hillel, goɗɗo Piraton laati alkaaliijo Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ Elɔŋ nɛ́ Abdɔŋ, bem ko Hilɛl, be Pirɛatɔŋ a̧ ɔɔ wan zu  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ Elɔŋ nɛ́ Abdɔŋ, bem ko Hilɛl, be Pirɛatɔŋ a̧ ɔɔ wan zu  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta Ɛlon, Abdon, wəzege ta Hilɛl mbe meleme ta Piraton ya kande meha ghwə te ghəa ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Blam äe mono, Abdon je ni Hilel je Piratonn kol car kiida jar Israyel wo.

Francais: Il eut quarante lits et trente petits-fils, qui montaient sur soixante-dix ânons. Il fut juge en Israël pendant huit ans;
Anglais: And he had forty sons and thirty nephews, that rode on threescore and ten ass colts: and he judged Israel eight years.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam vuɗ guron dok-fiɗi, guro-ŋolona valam dok-ɦidi. Kuro ma joriyo ma nisi ɓe kalamna dok-siɗiya. Nam ka kitata vi sa Israyella ir busat glafandi.
Bulu: A nga bili bobefame mewôm menyin a bendaé mewôm menyin be nga boʼo be wuluʼu e bijakase mewôme zamgbwale yôp. A mbe ntyiʼi mejô Israél tañe mimbu muam.
Guiziga: Mijiɗa zunguhoy a hay Abudoŋ kukur tarnaˀ, asi ziri naŋ mizileheye kukur mufaɗ, yo asi dideˀ naŋhay kukur makir. Abudoŋ a ga kiita da Israyele hã vi dangafaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe cappanɗe nayo e taaniraaɓe worɓe cappanɗe tato, ɓe wa'iiɓe bamɗe cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi. Abdon ɓii Hillel laati alkaaliijo Isra'iila duuɓi joweetati.
Fulfulde_DC: O woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe cappanɗe nayo e taaniraaɓe worɓe cappanɗe tato, ɓe wa'iiɓe bamɗe cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi. Abdon ɓii Hillel laati alkaaliijo Isra'iila duuɓi joweetati.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ be-wiwii ɓu-naar in o be-koo-aa ɓu-taar; wa ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo lɛŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ be tuifuu kpɔk kpɔk nɛ wa daŋ; a̧ duka zu o be  Israɛl  tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ be-wiwii ɓu-naar in o be-koo-aa ɓu-taar; wa ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo lɛŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ be tuifuu kpɔk kpɔk nɛ wa daŋ; a̧ duka zu o be  Israɛl  tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale wəfaɗemsə ve, mahekenemsə ka shihɛnyɛ nyi kedzeghwa te kwara lɛmə mberefaŋemsə. Abdon ya kande meha ghwə te ghəa ka Israyɛl kava deghese.
Tupurri: Se biñ weere do naa, moore äe hay wo ni do swa' lay. Saara hay seege ti weere gerheçeç wo do renam. Abdon joñ car kiida jar Israyel wo nen kiñgi nenma'aç.

Francais: puis Abdon, fils d'Illel, de Pharathon, mourut et fut enterré à Pharathon, dans le pays d'Ephraïm, sur la montagne des Amalécites.
Anglais: And Abdon the son of Hillel the Pirathonite died, and was buried in Pirathon in the land of Ephraim, in the mount of the Amalekites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol kayni nam mita, nisi pum hay Piraton, hay nagata vi Efrayim, kulo kay hiɗiyta vi sa Amalekŋa.
Bulu: Eyoñe te abdôn e mona Hilél, mone Piratônite a nga wu a jambe e Piratôn, e sii Efrayim, e nkôle Beamalésite.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, Abudoŋ mangal ngi Hilele, mbur Piratoŋ, a mucu, a dikaka a Piratoŋ, hirwuy Efrayim, ar muwã Amalek
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o maayi, ɓe uwi mo haa Piraton nder lesdi Efrayim, nder lesdi kooseeje Amaleki'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o maayi, ɓe uwi mo haa Piraton nder lesdi Efrayim, nder lesdi kooseeje Amaleki'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Abdɔŋ, bem ko Hilɛl, be Pirɛatɔŋ fea, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn nú Efraim sɛn zu kaya ko Amalɛk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Abdɔŋ, bem ko Hilɛl, be Pirɛatɔŋ fea, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn nú Efraim sɛn zu kaya ko Amalɛk.
Kapsiki_DC: Ca, mtiwə ŋkɛ, pa mbeli lamte ŋkɛ mbe Piraton te hɛɗia Ɛfrayim, pelɛ ghweme ta Amalɛk.
Tupurri: Abdon je ni Hilel je Piratonn kal hugi go, aè teen go Piraton äil sir Efrayim ciñ ti huuli mani jar Amalesidn wo.

Francais: Les enfants d'Israël firent encore ce qui est mal aux yeux de Yahweh, et Yahweh les livra entre les mains des Philistins, pendant quarante ans.
Anglais: And the children of Israel did evil again in the sight of the  Lord ; and the  Lord  delivered them into the hand of the Philistines forty years.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Israyel hot li va ma kir Ma-Vatɗin ŋaaɗi lo, nala Ma-Vatɗina hinsi goy hay ɓam sa Filistina ir busat dok-fiɗi.
Bulu: Ane bone bʼIsraél be nga beta bo mam me nʼabé e mise me Nti, a Nti a nga ve be e mo Befilisteñ tañe mimbu mewôm menyin.
Guiziga: Israyeley a gam malambaˀ le a mbuŋ Bumbulvuŋ siima, dar Bumbulvuŋ a vula taŋ asi haŋ ngi Filistihey hã vi kukur mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Fahin Isra'iila'en mbaɗi ko fottanaay Jawmiraawo. Ngam maajum o hokki ɓe haa juuɗe Filisti'en duuɓi cappanɗe nayi.
Fulfulde_DC: Fahin Isra'iila'en mbaɗi ko fottanaay Jawmiraawo. Ngam maajum o hokki ɓe haa juuɗe Filisti'en duuɓi cappanɗe nayi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  sii ɗoŋ tɛ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ a wa kɔ̧ er o be Filistii tɛ pɛ ɓu-naar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  sii ɗoŋ tɛ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ a wa kɔ̧ er o be Filistii tɛ pɛ ɓu-naar.
Kapsiki_DC: Zhɛne ka Israyɛl kamene wəsə kwa ndiremi kwa kema ta Mahwətə zhɛkwa. Vatse pelave nda hɛ Mahwətə ke ka Filisti kava wəfaɗemsə.
Tupurri: Jar Israyel joñ wo fen ma de älagge nen Manwur pa, Manwur kal haç rage go ne jar Filisteçeç wo äi coo do nen kiñgi do naa.

Francais: Il y avait un homme de Saraa, de la famille des Danites, nommé Manué ; sa femme était stérile, et n'avait pas enfanté.
Anglais: And there was a certain man of Zorah, of the family of the Danites, whose name was Manoah; and his wife was barren, and bare not.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa mara ay kep hay Soreya hay jafna vi Dan, yum Manohak, goor valam mayɗi, kay cata valam gediya.
Bulu: Môt éziñ a nga too Sôréa, e nda bôte Dañ, jôé na Manôa. E minga wé a mbe nkôkôm, teke mon.
Guiziga: Mbur ngi ruwuy Sora ada, a zilaka Manoa, ngir sukwi ngi Daŋ. Ngwas naŋ a yi ɗaˀ ta, i dirlay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i man woodi goɗɗo lenyol Dan, iwɗo Cor'a mo innde mum Manooha. Debbo maako dimaro, o meeɗaay danyugo.
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i man woodi goɗɗo lenyol Dan, iwɗo Cor'a mo innde mum Manooha. Debbo maako dimaro, o meeɗaay danyugo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋma be Sorea, nú-gara ko Dan a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ, nin-a nɛ Manɔa; kóò kɔ̧-a̧ yara so nɛ ndɔra.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋma be Sorea, nú-gara ko Dan a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ, nin-a nɛ Manɔa; kóò kɔ̧-a̧ yara so nɛ ndɔra.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te hɛɗia Sora, le kwete shɛ wəndə kwa yita ta ka Dan sləa ŋkɛ Manowa. Kajɛŋa male ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Blo po hay äi leege Soreya, ti feele mani Dañ no, aè hay ëege äe ga Manowa. Waçy äe hay go de gedge day se biñ gaè.

Francais: L'Ange de Yahweh apparut à la femme et lui dit : "Voici donc, tu es stérile et sans enfant; mais tu concevras et enfanteras un fils.
Anglais: And the angel of the  Lord  appeared unto the woman, and said unto her, Behold now, thou art barren, and bearest not: but thou shalt conceive, and bear a son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sunda-Wuralawn kep vul tuwam kir cata, ka di ta'a: Ɗuwagu, wulin kayn nak gediya, goor vag mayɗi, may nak ma sli haya, nak ma vuɗ gooro.
Bulu: Ane Engele Nti a nga yené e be minga a jô nye na: ô lôô na ô ne nkôkôm, te ke mon; nde wo ye nyoñ abum a biaé monafam.
Guiziga: Modro ngi Bumbulvuŋ a biga vu da ngwas tuwa, a ɓaŋ: «Yi si na le ki dirlay, ki yi ɗaˀ ta, amma kisa gi hur, ki yi mangal mizile.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo waŋgani debbo oo, wi'i mo: “Mi anndi a meeɗaay danyugo ɓiŋngel ngam a dimaro. Ammaa jonta a reedan, a danyan ɓiɗɗo gorko.
Fulfulde_DC: Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo waŋgani debbo oo, wi'i mo: “Mi anndi a meeɗaay danyugo ɓiŋngel ngam a dimaro. Ammaa jonta a reedan, a danyan ɓiɗɗo gorko.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Betom ko GASA WAN hɔɔ zu ha̧ ko-yar-ndɔra'i ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mi iŋa'e mɛ́ nɛ́ ko-yar-ndɔra nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ bem na. Mɛ tɛ ba zaŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ ko be-wiwii.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Betom ko GASA WAN hɔɔ zu ha̧ ko-yar-ndɔra'i ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mi iŋa'e mɛ́ nɛ́ ko-yar-ndɔra nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ bem na. Mɛ tɛ ba zaŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ ko be-wiwii.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwete hɛ ne, pa nde ghwene ta Mahwətə ncake nda geva ke malea shɛ, ma ke shɛ: «Nahe 'ya keɗepe kajɛŋa na, katedzawa hwə na kaya wəzege teza.
Tupurri: Je peele Manwur kal naa nen see äe ne waçy no, day riñn gano: Koëa, ndo go de gedge, ndo bay de biñgi wa. Ndo mañ ge äiili yañ day ndo biñ gi weel yañ.

Francais: Et maintenant, prends bien garde, ne bois ni vin ni liqueur forte et ne mange rien d'impur,
Anglais: Now therefore beware, I pray thee, and drink not wine nor strong drink, and eat not any unclean thing:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May wulin pa nak ma tun caw li ŋali, nak ma ci vinɗi, ci dolay ma galakŋaɗi kaw, tun ti ma liwis vunagɗi kaw.
Bulu: Eyoñe ji tukaʼa tabe ntyee, te nyu woon nge binyunyui bi ne ngu, nalé fe te di jôm é ne mvin.
Guiziga: Zle dana, ki si mbaazla ta, gwat mawi vu gar na, ki si ta, gwat mitika le ngi zum gar na, ki zum ta wãˀ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Reenta diga jonta, taa yar inaboojam malla nguykinoojam ngoɗɗam, taa nyaam karamɗum boo,
Fulfulde_DC: Reenta diga jonta, taa yar inaboojam malla nguykinoojam ngoɗɗam, taa nyaam karamɗum boo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kinii, ká mɛ́ nɔ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧, kóó ŋma ŋga mɔ na; ká mɛ́ nyɔŋ ŋma ndiŋ mɔ na,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kinii, ká mɛ́ nɔ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧, kóó ŋma ŋga mɔ na; ká mɛ́ nyɔŋ ŋma ndiŋ mɔ na,
Kapsiki_DC: Tsetsenyanyɛ ne, ya ghəa ŋa, mba na kesa tɛa rɛzɛŋe le yayata wəsə keghwəyi ŋkwa ba'a mba na kezeme wəsə kezeme nya wale wale,
Tupurri: Patalam no, koë see äo de ele, joo yii noga mopo maga taë see wa lay, ree mopo ma de ëag wa lay.

Francais: car tu vas concevoir et enfanter un fils. Le rasoir ne passera point sur sa tête, car cet enfant sera nazaréen de Dieu, dès le sein de sa mère, et c'est lui qui commencera à délivrer Israël de la main des Philistins."
Anglais: For, lo, thou shalt conceive, and bear a son; and no razor shall come on his head: for the child shall be a Nazarite unto God from the womb: and he shall begin to deliver Israel out of the hand of the Philistines.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay nak ma sli haya, nak ma vuɗ gooro, san as kay welem yalam goy hiɗi kew noŋɗi, kay mige goor namna kayni vuli goy tam Lawna kalaf hay sulumi pa, ma tun caw but sa Israyel goy hay ɓam sa Filistin ɗawn mi namu.
Bulu: Amu wo ye nyoñ abum a biaé monafam. Lame a ye bo te lôt e nlô wé, amu mon ate a ye bo étyi e mfaʼa Zambe aso abume nyia, a nye a ye taté na a nyii Israél e wo Befilisteñ
Guiziga: asi hur ɗik na, kisa yi di mangal mizile. Anta sa ɗuvakaŋ sliwiɗ avu hirnga ta, asi mangala, a sa vulaka da Buymisemuŋ zle a kwacay mumuŋ. Masa zla laha Israyeley tisi haŋ Filistihey i naŋ».
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ngam reedu ndu e ɓesnuki ɓiɗɗo ma oo. Taa laɓu gaasa hoore maako sam, ngam o cenaaɗo Allah diga o danyaaka. Kaŋko fuɗɗata hisnugo Isra'iila'en e juuɗe Filisti'en .”
Fulfulde_DC: ngam reedu ndu e ɓesnuki ɓiɗɗo ma oo. Taa laɓu gaasa hoore maako sam, ngam o cenaaɗo Allah diga o danyaaka. Kaŋko fuɗɗata hisnugo Isra'iila'en e juuɗe Filisti'en .”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wen mɛ tɛ ba zaŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ koo be-wiwii. Mɛ beka kpui zu-a nɛ pai na, wen bem’ɛi tɛ duk nɛ́ ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ gbonɛ; nɛ́ bem’ɛi a̧ tɛ ku̧ naŋ kpasa  Israɛl  er o be Filistii.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wen mɛ tɛ ba zaŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ koo be-wiwii. Mɛ beka kpui zu-a nɛ pai na, wen bem’ɛi tɛ duk nɛ́ ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ gbonɛ; nɛ́ bem’ɛi a̧ tɛ ku̧ naŋ kpasa  Israɛl  er o be Filistii.»
Kapsiki_DC: kwa nza ŋkɛ katedzawa hwə na kaya wəzege teza. Kaha mpiɗi mbeli kadzembe ghəa ŋkɛ we, kwa nza ŋkɛ kaŋa Shala veyi geva ŋkɛ se kwa hwə, gheŋkɛ nde tembele ka Israyɛl va ka Filisti.»
Tupurri: Gahaçyla ndo day na mañ äiili day ndo biñ gi weel yañ. Moceçeçti kañ ge jag ne hen ti gaa hase, werga weel sen la joñ ge go sagsag ma Baa le go äil man äe haçaç. Day tï¡ï¡ gi yaçaç Israyel go do jar Filisteçeç wo na diñ se.

Francais: La femme alla dire à son mari : "Un homme de Dieu est venu vers moi; il avait l'aspect d'un ange de Dieu, un aspect redoutable. Je ne lui ai pas demandé d'où il était, et il ne m'a pas fait connaître son nom;
Anglais: Then the woman came and told her husband, saying, A man of God came unto me, and his countenance was like the countenance of an angel of God, very terrible: but I asked him not whence he was, neither told he me his name:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Cat tuɗ vi labar namna mi jufa'a, na' ka dum ala: Sana vi Lawna kep co tanu, nam sli sunda-wuralawn nala, kay nam ɗuwan ɦuyum' ŋolo, nan may jobom kay liyn ma nam may hayam panɗi, nam may ɗekan selemɗi kaw.
Bulu: Ane minga a nga ke kate nnôm na: Môta Zambe a te zu be ma, a funaʼane Engele Zambe, jame te da too ékowoñ. Me nji sili nye vôm a so, nye kik teke kate ma jôé dé.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, ngwas a mi ngi hay, a ra ɓa zil naŋ na: «Mbur ngi Buymisemuŋ a so le avu ya, deŋ naŋ a wuɗ a bam vu ati modro ngi Buymisemuŋ, a gi zluwun da mbur. Ki so ti damaka na, yi cufuɗaŋ ta, yo a bigiy slimiɗ naŋ ta.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Debbo nasti saare, wi'i gorum: “Goɗɗo Allah wari haa am. Bana mi yi'iri mo nii, goɗɗo wi'an o malaa'ikaajo Allah, o kulniiɗo masin. Mi ƴamaay mo haa o iwoy, o anndinaay yam innde maako boo.
Fulfulde_DC: Debbo nasti saare, wi'i gorum: “Goɗɗo Allah wari haa am. Bana mi yi'iri mo nii, goɗɗo wi'an o malaa'ikaajo Allah, o kulniiɗo masin. Mi ƴamaay mo haa o iwoy, o anndinaay yam innde maako boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kóò‘i sii ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wii: «Ŋma bíí ko Sɔ̧ tɛɛ pii tɛ‘m; a̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa in betom ko Sɔ̧. A̧ dee kíì pi̧ tɛ‘m nyɛmna; mi ak fara n'aa tɛ nɛnɛ na, a̧ sa nin-a ha̧‘m na mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kóò‘i sii ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wii: «Ŋma bíí ko Sɔ̧ tɛɛ pii tɛ‘m; a̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa in betom ko Sɔ̧. A̧ dee kíì pi̧ tɛ‘m nyɛmna; mi ak fara n'aa tɛ nɛnɛ na, a̧ sa nin-a ha̧‘m na mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa malea shɛ jɛghɛ ba'a gezete nda ke za nta, ma ke: «Nahe nde wəndəa Shala kencɛte ɗa geva. Kala nde ghwene ta Shala pa ta ŋkɛ, kaganda benake wəndə ve. Kese 'ya ka'yɛwe ve ne, tema se na wa 'ya shɛ we, ama kese kancɛ ɗa sləa ŋkɛ we.
Tupurri: Waçy kal rawge wii war äe gano: Je mani Baa po a da' mege, aà hay koge nen äi do je peele Baa nono, kidolgi aà hay sara. Ndi wiin ga aà a le gen la gaa lay, se kañ ëu äe me gaa lay.

Francais: mais il m'a dit "Tu vas concevoir et enfanter un fils; et maintenant, ne bois ni vin ni liqueur forte, et ne mange rien d'impur, parce que cet enfant sera nazaréen de Dieu dès le sein de sa mère, jusqu'au jour de sa mort."
Anglais: But he said unto me, Behold, thou shalt conceive, and bear a son; and now drink no wine nor strong drink, neither eat any unclean thing: for the child shall be a Nazarite to God from the womb to the day of his death.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May nam ka dan ala nan ma sli haya, nan ma vuɗ gooro, wulin kayn nan ci vinɗi lay ci dolay ma galakɗi lay, nan ma ti va ma liwisɗi lay, kay goor namna kayni, kalaf hay sulumi pa ta-ta tam mitta valamu, nam vuli goy tam Lawna.
Bulu: Ve a te jô ma na: Ô lôô wo ye nyoñ abum a biaé monafam; ataté éyoñe ji te nyu woon nge binyunyui bi ne ngu nge di jôm é ne mvin, amu mon ate a ye bo étyi e mfaʼa Nti aso abume nyia akekui e môs a ye wu.
Guiziga: A ɓiy na: «Ani kisa gi hur, kisa yi mangal mizile. Zle dana, ki si mbaazla ta, gwat mawi vu gar na, kisa ta. Gwat mitika le ngi zum gar na, ki zum ta wãˀ, asi a sa vulaka mangala da Buymisemuŋ zle a kwacay mumuŋ, hã sesẽŋ avu muc naŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wi'i yam a reedan, a danyan ɓiɗɗo gorko. O umri yam taa mi yara inaboojam malla nguykinoojam ngoɗɗam, taa mi nyaama karamɗum, ngam ɓiɗɗo oo laatoto cenaaɗo ngam Allah diga o siwaa danyeego haa yotto maayde maako.”
Fulfulde_DC: O wi'i yam a reedan, a danyan ɓiɗɗo gorko. O umri yam taa mi yara inaboojam malla nguykinoojam ngoɗɗam, taa mi nyaama karamɗum, ngam ɓiɗɗo oo laatoto cenaaɗo ngam Allah diga o siwaa danyeego haa yotto maayde maako.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ tɛ ba zaŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ ko be-wiwii. Kinii ká mɛ́ nɔ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ká mɛ́ nɔ́ ŋma ŋga mɔ na, ká mɛ́ nyɔŋ ŋma ndiŋ mɔ na mbɛt, wen bem’ɛi tɛ duk nɛ́ ko Sɔ̧ ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ nɛnɛ wese fio kɔ̧-a̧.› »
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ tɛ ba zaŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ ko be-wiwii. Kinii ká mɛ́ nɔ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ká mɛ́ nɔ́ ŋma ŋga mɔ na, ká mɛ́ nyɔŋ ŋma ndiŋ mɔ na mbɛt, wen bem’ɛi tɛ duk nɛ́ ko Sɔ̧ ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ nɛnɛ wese fio kɔ̧-a̧.› »
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke sha 'ya: katedzawa hwə na kaya wəzege teza. Yagha na kasa tɛa rɛzɛŋe le yayata wəsə keghwəyi ŋkwa mbe nza ta ŋa ba'a mba na kezeme wəsə kezeme nya wale wale, kwa nza ŋkɛ kaŋa Shala veyi ŋkɛ tewə ŋkɛ keya ba'a pa te nza ta mpia ŋkɛ.»
Tupurri: Ama se wii me an gano: Koëa ndo day na mañ äiili, ndo biñ gi weel yañ. Patalam no, joo yii noga mopo maga taë see wa lay, ree fen po ma de ëag wa lay. Werga weel sen joñ ge go sagsag ma Baa le go äil man äe haçaç wo go ti wur huli äe.

Francais: Alors Manué invoqua Yahweh et dit : "Je vous prie, Seigneur, que l'homme de Dieu que vous avez envoyé vienne encore vers nous, et qu'il nous enseigne ce que nous devons faire pour l'enfant qui naîtra"
Anglais: Then Manoah entreated the  Lord , and said, O my Lord, let the man of God which thou didst send come again unto us, and teach us what we shall do unto the child that shall be born.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Manohak hot giɗel del Lawna dumu: Bum-Sumuna, sana vaŋ ma naŋ gumi sun jewna hot ay tuma mara hot loge, nam ɗekma yal namna ma numa ma lum tam goor namna ɗawn ɗek ge.
Bulu: Nde Manôa a nga yeʼelane Nti a jô na: A Nti, boʼo na e môta Zambe ô nga lôm a beta zu be bia, a yeʼele bia jam bia yiane bo asu mon a ye bialé!
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Manoa a tumbulo Bumbulvuŋ, a ɓaŋ: «Ambuh Bumbulvuŋ ɗu, anja mbur ngi Buymisemuŋ ka mislino di na, a mo ng'avi ndra ava ma, ɓa a dubuna ndra gwat ndra masa gaka da mangala, ti ndra miyaka le.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Manooha tori Jawmiraawo: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, goɗɗo Allah mo nelɗa, accu o wara haa amin fahin, o yecca min ko min mbaɗanta ɓiŋngel danyeteeŋgel.”
Fulfulde_DC: Manooha tori Jawmiraawo: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, goɗɗo Allah mo nelɗa, accu o wara haa amin fahin, o yecca min ko min mbaɗanta ɓiŋngel danyeteeŋgel.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Manɔa aia nú ha̧ GASA WAN ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ bíí ko Sɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ toma'i mɛ tɛ pii tɛ yɛ woyo, ha̧ a̧ mɛ usi mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ de wen bem’ɛi ŋgimbi nɛ‘i tɛ ko nɛ a̧.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Manɔa aia nú ha̧ GASA WAN ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ bíí ko Sɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ toma'i mɛ tɛ pii tɛ yɛ woyo, ha̧ a̧ mɛ usi mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ de wen bem’ɛi ŋgimbi nɛ‘i tɛ ko nɛ a̧.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Manowa səkwəte Mahwətə: «Nde sleke ɗa, te zlaɓa ta ŋa, zhɛneke n'yɛ wəndəa Shala nya ghweneke nya na vecagha kase sha ghen'yɛ, kezha tekete n'yɛ wəsə nya temene ghen'yɛ le wəzege teza nya keteya nya.»
Tupurri: Manowa kal tos Manwur gano: Wañkluu, daga je mani Baa maga ndo hay äo'n le mo fer le wurpo ëa pa day mo had wuur de fen maga wuur nen joñge see weel se maga biñ gi mono!

Francais: Dieu exauça la prière de Manué, et l'Ange de Dieu vint encore vers la femme; elle était assise dans un champ, et Manué, son mari, n'était pas avec elle.
Anglais: And God hearkened to the voice of Manoah; and the angel of God came again unto the woman as she sat in the field: but Manoah her husband was not with her.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawn hum siɗawta vi Manohak. Sunda-wuralawna hotay tam cata valam mara lo: Na' ka musi goy hay sinen dam, jufa' may kuɗa'ɗi.
Bulu: Nde Nti a nga wôʼô tyiñe Manôa, a Engele Zambe a nga beta zu be minga; a nga too afub été, nnôme wé, Manôa, a nji bo valé.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a cine mingiɓi ngi Manoa tuwa le, joˀ modro ngi Buymisemuŋ a mo ng'avi ngwas tuwa ma, naɓa ngwasa a ro ar guva, yo zil naŋ Manoa naŋ anta acikeˀe ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Allah jaɓi tornde Manooha nde'e, malaa'ikaajo maako wari fahin haa debbo Manooha, saa'i debbo ɗon jooɗi haa ngesa. Goriiko wondaay bee maako,
Fulfulde_DC: Allah jaɓi tornde Manooha nde'e, malaa'ikaajo maako wari fahin haa debbo Manooha, saa'i debbo ɗon jooɗi haa ngesa. Goriiko wondaay bee maako,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ zia kɔfa mɔ ko Manɔa, ɓɛɛ betom kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ tɛ kóò‘i woyo. A̧ duk so nɛ́ nù kpɛɛfɔ, ɓɛɛ ká wíì kɔ̧-a̧ Manɔa bo so in a̧ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ zia kɔfa mɔ ko Manɔa, ɓɛɛ betom kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ tɛ kóò‘i woyo. A̧ duk so nɛ́ nù kpɛɛfɔ, ɓɛɛ ká wíì kɔ̧-a̧ Manɔa bo so in a̧ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Shala fate səkwə ta Manowa: zhɛne nde ghwene ta Shala kase sha male vəa ŋkwa nya nza nde kwamte. Ashɛ za nta tagha yite we.
Tupurri: Manwur kal laa jag Manowa. Je peele Baan fer le see waçyn pa. Waçyn hay de hayle äil pay day war äe Manowa hay bay see äe ni wa.

Francais: La femme courut aussitôt informer son mari et lui dit : "Voici, l'homme qui est venu l'autre jour vers moi m'est apparu."
Anglais: And the woman made haste, and ran, and shewed her husband, and said unto him, Behold, the man hath appeared unto me, that came unto me the other day.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Na' fokay jaŋi, mar labara mi jufa'a kay dum ala sa ma vul tuwam kiran hay buur hena hotiyawa tan mara'a lo.
Bulu: Nde a nga jiʼa mate mbil a ke kate de nnôm a jô nye na: tame yen môt a mbe be ma a ôjane valé a beteya yené be ma.
Guiziga: Ngwas a kil kutum, ara ɓa da zil naŋ, a ɓaŋ: «Pura mbur muso ti di numuŋ ng'avi ya tuwa, a bigiy vu le ma.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ngam maajum o yaawɗi, o wi'i mo: “Ndaa, goɗɗo garɗo haa am nyannde go, waŋgani yam fahin.”
Fulfulde_DC: ngam maajum o yaawɗi, o wi'i mo: “Ndaa, goɗɗo garɗo haa am nyannde go, waŋgani yam fahin.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ahai, kóò‘i maa yì nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ wíì kɔ‘i'e: «Wi’ɛ nɛ tɛɛ so tɛ‘m’ɛ pia ɗoŋ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ahai, kóò‘i maa yì nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ wíì kɔ‘i'e: «Wi’ɛ nɛ tɛɛ so tɛ‘m’ɛ pia ɗoŋ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Tereŋe tehwɛ kahe kahe kalə kageze nda ke za nta: «Wəndə nya kese nya sha 'ya vecagha gɛ ne, na kencɛte ɗa geva zhɛkwa.»
Tupurri: Se kal ur ëee deparday siigi äe ne war äe day riñn gano: Koëa, blo maga hay a wurpo see äi la naa nen see äe we me pa so.

Francais: Manué se leva et, suivant sa femme, il alla vers l'homme et lui dit : "Est-ce toi qui as parlé à cette femme? "
Anglais: And Manoah arose, and went after his wife, and came to the man, and said unto him, Art thou the man that spakest unto the woman? And he said, I am.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Manohak fok kulo gosoy wit' tap kuɗ cata valamu, tuɗ tam sa namna ka dumu: Zawn mi naŋ ma di yoboynis hiɗi cat zawn su? Nam ka hot dit ala: Awa mi nanu.
Bulu: Ane Manôa a nga kôlô si a tôñe nga, a ke e be môta Zambe a jô nye na: Ye wo wo te kobôô e minga nyô? Nde a nga yalane na: Ma foʼo.
Guiziga: Manoa a slikiɗ kutum, a sipa ngwasa, aru ng'avi mbur tuwa, a ɓaŋ: «Ki mbur miɓa ɓi da ngwas hana na kwa?» Naŋ kwana a mbiɗaŋ di: «I ya gisiŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Manooha ummi, tokki debbo muuɗum haa goɗɗo man, o ƴami mo: “An wolwani debbo am na?” O jaabi: “Ooho, ɗum min.”
Fulfulde_DC: Manooha ummi, tokki debbo muuɗum haa goɗɗo man, o ƴami mo: “An wolwani debbo am na?” O jaabi: “Ooho, ɗum min.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Manɔa kura ndak pata kóò kɔ‘i sitɛ wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ ak a̧: «Wi nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen ha̧ kóò'ɛ nɛ ɛnɛ nde?» A̧ kifa nu'e: «Nɛ́ mi nɛ mbetɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Manɔa kura ndak pata kóò kɔ‘i sitɛ wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ ak a̧: «Wi nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen ha̧ kóò'ɛ nɛ ɛnɛ nde?» A̧ kifa nu'e: «Nɛ́ mi nɛ mbetɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Cape Manowa kwa sebe ta male ta ŋkɛ, pa hendave nda geva ke wəndəa shɛ, ma ke shɛ: «Gha nde gezete nda ghena ke male nya na?» -- «E'e, 'ya ŋkɛ», a ke zhɛnete nda.
Tupurri: Manowa kal urgi go ciñ, mañ blam waçy äe wo see blo no. Se day riñn gano: Hay waçaç waçaçre ne waçyn la na diñ ndo mbo yawla? Se kal ferge ga: Diñ ndi mbi!

Francais: Il répondit: "C'est moi." Manué dit : "Maintenant, quand ta parole s'accomplira, que faudra-t-il observer à l'égard de cet enfant, et qu'y aura-t-il à faire pour lui?"
Anglais: And Manoah said, Now let thy words come to pass. How shall we order the child, and how shall we do unto him?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Manohak ka dumu: Hay li ma vun dita vaŋ hobawa goyona, numa ma kot tuw goor kottige? Goor namna ma lum linige?
Bulu: Ane Manôa a nga jô na: Eyoñe ji, nge nkobô wôé ô tôéban, za ñyeʼelane a za mame bia yiane bo asu mon?
Guiziga: Manoa a ɓaŋ: «Ani mingiɓi ɗik a sa gi gisiŋ, na gwat ndra masa gam vur mangal i mike? Jiviɗ ngi sipi vur mangala i wanaka.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Manooha wi'i: Booɗɗum. To bolle ma ngooŋɗi, umrooje ɗeye min tokkoto ko laarani ɓiŋngel ngel? Ɗume min ngaɗanta ngel?
Fulfulde_DC: Manooha wi'i: Booɗɗum. To bolle ma ngooŋɗi, umrooje ɗeye min tokkoto ko laarani ɓiŋngel ngel? Ɗume min ngaɗanta ngel?
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Manɔa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Kinii, hee wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ ga, nɛ́ ge a̧ bem’ɛi tɛ de ge? Ɛɛ tɛ de mɔ in a̧ hee ge?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Manɔa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Kinii, hee wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ ga, nɛ́ ge a̧ bem’ɛi tɛ de ge? Ɛɛ tɛ de mɔ in a̧ hee ge?»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Manowa shɛ: «Ma kemenete geva ŋkɛ kala ghena ta ŋa nya ne, tsema tenza ghen'yɛ laka gheŋkɛ wa? Wa yahi ghen'yɛ kamene kezha gheŋkɛ wa?»
Tupurri: Manowa kal ga: Patala de maga waçaçre äon le' ge jag we go so mono, wuur nen koë see wuur na koëge see weel sen la? Wuur mo joñn joñge la?

Francais: L'ange de Yahweh répondit à Manué : "La femme s'abstiendra de tout ce que je lui ai dit :
Anglais: And the angel of the  Lord  said unto Manoah, Of all that I said unto the woman let her beware.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sunda-wuralawna di tam Manohak: Cat ma li kuɗ sle ma nan da'ti kafna.
Bulu: Nde Engele Nti a nga yalane Manôa na: Minga a yiane saʼale biôm bise me nga jô nye.
Guiziga: Modro ngi Bumbulvuŋ a ɓa Manoa na: «Gwat ya muslufa taŋ da ngwas hana, anja a duko taŋ ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo jaabi Manooha: “Sey debbo ma daayo ko mi limtani mo fuu:
Fulfulde_DC: Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo jaabi Manooha: “Sey debbo ma daayo ko mi limtani mo fuu:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Betom ko GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Manɔa: «Kóò'ɛ a̧ dor tɛ̀ tɛ́ mɔ lɛŋ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Betom ko GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Manɔa: «Kóò'ɛ a̧ dor tɛ̀ tɛ́ mɔ lɛŋ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa nde ghwene ta Mahwətə zhɛnete nda ke Manowa: «Mba malea shɛ kekwaɗe wəshi nyi gezete nda 'ya pɛtɛ:
Tupurri: Je peele Manwurn kal ferge ne Manowa gano: Waçyn mo ëaw see äe see feçeçre maga ndi hay fer ra ne hen mo äuy no.

Francais: elle ne mangera rien de ce qui provient de la vigne, elle ne boira ni vin ni liqueur forte et elle ne mangera rien d'impur : tout ce que je lui ai prescrit, elle l'observera."
Anglais: She may not eat of any thing that cometh of the vine, neither let her drink wine or strong drink, nor eat any unclean thing: all that I commanded her let her observe.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Va ma may goy hay vuɗ gulda-guldan pana na' as tamamɗi, vinna hiɗi dolay ma galakŋa na' as kay tamamɗi, na' as ti va ma liwisɗi. Sle ma nan da'ti kafna na' as ŋomom kulo ka' ŋaa'a.
Bulu: A nji yiane di jôm ése ja so e ndiʼi woon, a ye bo te nyu woon nge binyunyui bi ne ngu, nge di jôm é ne mvin; a ye baʼale e mam mese me maneya nye liti.
Guiziga: Gwat magaka ti yi ngi gudubun gar na, anja a zuma ta, ko anja a si mbaazla ta, gwat mawi vu gar na, anja a sa ta. Gwat mitika le ngi zum gar na, a zum ta wãˀ. Ɓi ya miɓaŋ taŋ ɗaˀle gar na, anja a sipa taŋ kuy kuy.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Taa o metta ko iwi haa inabohi fuu, taa o yara inaboojam malla njaram nguykinoojam, taa o nyaama karamɗum. Sey o hakkilana umrooje am fuu booɗɗum.”
Fulfulde_DC: Taa o metta ko iwi haa inabohi fuu, taa o yara inaboojam malla njaram nguykinoojam, taa o nyaama karamɗum. Sey o hakkilana umrooje am fuu booɗɗum.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ beka nyɔŋ ŋma mɔ nɛ tɛ́ nɛ tɛ waya nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ na, a̧ beka nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ na, a̧ beka nɔ ŋga mɔ na. A̧ beka nyɔŋ ndiŋ mɔ na, a̧ tɛ mbo zu tɛ mɔ lɛŋ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘i.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ beka nyɔŋ ŋma mɔ nɛ tɛ́ nɛ tɛ waya nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ na, a̧ beka nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ na, a̧ beka nɔ ŋga mɔ na. A̧ beka nyɔŋ ndiŋ mɔ na, a̧ tɛ mbo zu tɛ mɔ lɛŋ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘i.»
Kapsiki_DC: mba nde kendɛame ya ta rɛzɛŋe, mba kesa ya wəsə nya keghwəyi ŋkwa, yagha kazeme wəsə kezeme nya wale wale. Pa kaya ghena ta ɗa nya gezave nda 'ya megela.»
Tupurri: AÀ mo baa jag ti le'ge tlalum wa. A mo joo yii noga fen po ma taë seege po wa lay, mo ree fen ma de ëag po wa lay. A mo oo ti fen maga ndi hay waçaç ne hen mo äuy no.

Francais: Manué dit à l'Ange de Yahweh : "Permets que nous le retenions et que nous t'apprêtions un chevreau."
Anglais: And Manoah said unto the angel of the  Lord , I pray thee, let us detain thee, until we shall have made ready a kid for thee.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Manohak ka di tam sunda-wuralawna: Numa min ala naŋ ma kal deɗi, kay numa' min ŋataŋ goor ɦu ma jakayna.
Bulu: Ane Manôa a nga jô Engele Nti na: kañeseʼe na me buʼu wo a yame wo mon ékela.
Guiziga: Manoa a ɓa Modro ngi Bumbulvuŋ tuwa: «Inga pula ndra jiviɗ ɓa i tikukuw, i ra dukuw useˀ ngi zuŋ ˀaw minjaslsla so»,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Manooha wi'i malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo: “Reenu seɗɗa min nyaancane  jawgel mbeewa.”
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Manooha wi'i malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo: “Reenu seɗɗa min nyaancane  jawgel mbeewa.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Manɔa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ betom ko GASA WAN: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk benaŋ hɛ̧ɛ̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ gi be gbadua h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Manɔa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ betom ko GASA WAN: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk benaŋ hɛ̧ɛ̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ gi be gbadua h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Manowa sha nde ghwene ta Mahwətə: «Ndeke n'yɛ hweŋkwa kakeseyi ŋa ghen'yɛ katemə ɓɛhwɛ, katehene ŋa zhɛgwəa kwe ghen'yɛ.»
Tupurri: Manowa kal wii je peele Manwurn gano: Hay ye' nen maga wuur joñ weel fii po go mo ëa.

Francais: L'Ange de Yahweh répondit à Manué "Quand tu me retiendrais, je ne mangerais pas de ton mets ; mais si tu veux préparer un holocauste, à Yahweh, offre-le." -- Manué ne savait pas que c'était l'Ange de Yahweh –
Anglais: And the angel of the  Lord  said unto Manoah, Though thou detain me, I will not eat of thy bread: and if thou wilt offer a burnt offering, thou must offer it unto the  Lord . For Manoah knew not that he was an angel of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sunda-Wuralawna hot di tam Manohak: La naŋ min telan kay ti fuwa, nan may ti fu vaŋɗi, may la naŋ min li ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna, laŋ ɗifin namna tam Lawna. Kay Manohak may wiy goy jew ala kayni ti sunda-wuralawnaɗi.
Bulu: Nde Engele Nti a nga yalane Manôa na: Toʼo wo buʼu ma, ma ye bo te di bidi biôé; ve nge wo kômbô ve Nti mvean ô ne ngumba, boʼo nalé! Manôa a nji yeme na Engele Nti e nye le.
Guiziga: Modro ngi Bumbulvuŋ tuwa, a mbiɗaŋ di: «Ko da ki tikiy le kwana, y'anta sa zum ɗaf ɗike ta. Amma da ki wuɗ gi mikuli mizlam zlam le da Bumbulvuŋ na, ga ɓula».
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Malaa'ikaajo jaabi: “Koo to mi reeni, mi nyaamataa nyaamdu ndu a taaskantam. Ammaa to a yiɗi hokkugo jawgel man, lii'ana ngel Jawmiraawo guleteeŋgel.” Manooha faamaayno ɗum malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Malaa'ikaajo jaabi: “Koo to mi reeni, mi nyaamataa nyaamdu ndu a taaskantam. Ammaa to a yiɗi hokkugo jawgel man, lii'ana ngel Jawmiraawo guleteeŋgel.” Manooha faamaayno ɗum malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Betom ko GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Manɔa: «Kóó mɛ dora so'm, mi beka nyɔŋ mɔ kɔ-mɛ na; ɓɛɛ kà mɛ́ nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧, mɛ̀ dɔ́ ha̧ GASA WAN.» Manɔa iŋ so kɔ‘i'e nɛ́ betom ko GASA WAN na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Betom ko GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Manɔa: «Kóó mɛ dora so'm, mi beka nyɔŋ mɔ kɔ-mɛ na; ɓɛɛ kà mɛ́ nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧, mɛ̀ dɔ́ ha̧ GASA WAN.» Manɔa iŋ so kɔ‘i'e nɛ́ betom ko GASA WAN na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke nde ghwene ta Mahwətə zhɛnete nda: «Ya 'ya nza katemə ne, ashɛ 'ya katezeme wəsə kezeme ta ŋa we. Ama keɗe na kadzeghe nda melɛ kwa tere tere ke Mahwətə, menete.» Keɗepe Manowa kande ghwene ta Mahwətə ŋkɛ we.
Tupurri: Je peele Manwur raw ferge ne Manowa gano: Ndo mo caa bo wañ ti äi la laybla no, ndi kaçaç ge ma ree reege äon gaè. Day hayga saçy joñ fen sii jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy yañ ne Manwur ti äo no, ni ndo joñn mbo ane. Manowa hay bay de koge ga aà diñ je peele Manwur wa.

Francais: Et Manué dit à l'Ange de Yahweh : "Quel est ton nom, afin que nous t'honorions, quand ta parole s'accomplira?"
Anglais: And Manoah said unto the angel of the  Lord , What is thy name, that when thy sayings come to pass we may do thee honour?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Manohak hot job tam sunda-wuralawna: Semda vaŋ anige? Kay la va ma naŋ dumna laawana, numa ɗawn ma suburaŋ seŋu.
Bulu: Nde Manôa a nga jô Engele Nti na: Jôé dôé é ne za, éyoñe te bia ye kañe wo éyoñe mejô môé ma ye tôéban?
Guiziga: Manoa a ɓa modro ngi Bumbulvuŋ: «Slimiɗ ɗike mbrike, asi da mingiɓi ɗik misa gi le muduba na, i sa ɗuvukuw hirnga?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Manooha wi'i mo: “Anndin min innde ma ngam haa min teddina ma to bolle ma ngooŋɗi.”
Fulfulde_DC: Manooha wi'i mo: “Anndin min innde ma ngam haa min teddina ma to bolle ma ngooŋɗi.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Manɔa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ betom ko GASA WAN: «Nin'nɛ́ nɛ o k’ɛɛ de k’ɛɛ tu̧u̧ tɛ‘nɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ o?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Manɔa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ betom ko GASA WAN: «Nin'nɛ́ nɛ o k’ɛɛ de k’ɛɛ tu̧u̧ tɛ‘nɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ o?»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke 'yɛwete ve: «Gezete n'yɛ sləa ŋa nda ɗepe ve zləvə ghen'yɛ te gha kemenete geva ghena nya gezete nya na.»
Tupurri: Manowa day riñ je peele Manwurn so gano: Ëu äo gahaçy nen maga wuur togoë mo de maga waçaçre äon le' ge jag we go so mo la?

Francais: L'Ange de Yahweh lui répondit : "Pourquoi m'interroges-tu sur mon nom? Il est Merveilleux."
Anglais: And the angel of the  Lord  said unto him, Why askest thou thus after my name, seeing it is secret?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sunda-wuralawna ka dumu: Naŋ joban sen kay mige? Namu mi ma jifiy ŋolo.
Bulu: Ane Engele Nti a nga yalane nye na: Amu jé wo sili jôé dam? E ne jam e ne nsolan.
Guiziga: Modro ngi Bumbulvuŋ a mbiɗaŋ di: «Ki cufuɗa slimiɗ ɗu ngi mike? Slimiɗ ɗu anta sli wala ta.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo jaabi: “Ngam ɗume ƴamata innde am? Nde kaayeefiire.”
Fulfulde_DC: Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo jaabi: “Ngam ɗume ƴamata innde am? Nde kaayeefiire.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Betom ko GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Wen ge mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ iŋ nin-am ge? Nin-am nɛ́ mɔ̀ nɛ̀ ɔ ɗuka.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Betom ko GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Wen ge mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ iŋ nin-am ge? Nin-am nɛ́ mɔ̀ nɛ̀ ɔ ɗuka.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke nde ghwene ta Mahwətə zhɛnete nda: «Yitea wa ɗe na kaɗepe slə ɗa wa? Kaslə meŋele sləa shɛ.»
Tupurri: Je peele Manwur kal ferge gana: Ndo wii ëu äi gahaçyla? A diñ fen ma de yoñre.

Francais: Manué prit le chevreau avec l'oblation et l'offrit à Yahweh sur le rocher, et Yahweh fit un prodige pendant que Manué et sa femme regardaient.
Anglais: So Manoah took a kid with a meat offering, and offered it upon a rock unto the  Lord : and the angel did wondrously; and Manoah and his wife looked on.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Manohak vi goor ɦu ma jakayna hiɗi va ma vulda, li difin tam Ma-Vatɗina kulo hay hiɗiyta. Hay li ma Manohak hiɗi cata valam ka sar na lak kayni, ɗekka kep li'e:
Bulu: Nde Manôa a nga nyoñ mon ékela a avut, ane a nga ve Nti mvean ô ne ngumba akôme yôp. Nde ndimba jam é nga boban nté Manôa a e minga wé be mbe be fombôʼô;
Guiziga: Manoa a ji zuŋ ˀaw minjaslsla waɗ gwat ngi vul, a gi taŋ mikuli taˀ a muwã, da Bumbulvuŋ maga slra misi mbur a sla wala naŋ gu ta tuwa, Manoa ati ngwas naŋ, a roko hiri taˀ avu mikuli.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Manooha hoo'i jawgel mbeewa e dokkal nyaamdu, lii'ani ɗum Jawmiraawo dow tapaare. Jawmiraawo waɗi kaayeefi yaake Manooha e debbo muuɗum ɗon ndaara.
Fulfulde_DC: Manooha hoo'i jawgel mbeewa e dokkal nyaamdu, lii'ani ɗum Jawmiraawo dow tapaare. Jawmiraawo waɗi kaayeefi yaake Manooha e debbo muuɗum ɗon ndaara.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Manɔa baa be gbadua in ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ́ɛ̀ ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN zu ta, ha̧ wi nɛ deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ ɗuka. Manɔa in kóò kɔ‘i ya so zɔk nɛ mɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Manɔa baa be gbadua in ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ́ɛ̀ ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN zu ta, ha̧ wi nɛ deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ ɗuka. Manɔa in kóò kɔ‘i ya so zɔk nɛ mɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Manowa kelete zhɛgwəa kwe ba'a wəsə nya keleke mbeli, pa beteyi hɛ te gela kezha ve nda ke Mahwətə, gheŋkɛ nya kemene wəshi meŋele. Ma vəa ŋkwa nya newe ŋkwa yɛ Manowa le male ta ŋkɛ ne,
Tupurri: Manowa kal baa fiin wo de fen haçge no, se raw joñ siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy ne Manwur ciñ ti huuli no. Fen mbuëgi kal joñge de maga Manowa wo de waçy äe de ko nen mono.

Francais: Comme la flamme montait de dessus l'autel vers le ciel, l'Ange de Yahweh monta dans la flamme de l'autel. A cette vue, Manué et sa terrine tombèrent la face contre terre.
Anglais: For it came to pass, when the flame went up toward heaven from off the altar, that the angel of the  Lord  ascended in the flame of the altar. And Manoah and his wife looked on it, and fell on their faces to the ground.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma sin-kuta ta nisi ŋala' kuɗ liyn ma ɗifinna ka tuɗ kulo'o hay Wuralawn kayni, sunda-wuralawna jik kulo jar kuta vi giwin-ma-ɗifinna. Hay li ma Manohak hiɗi cat valam wi kayni, nisi dab voksi gaa'a kay nagata.
Bulu: a nga bo na ôtita ô betek ataʼa metunaʼa a ke yôp, nde Engele Nti a nga bet e nkabaʼa nduan ya ataʼa metunaʼa. Eyoñ be nga yene jame te, ane Manôa ba minga wé be nga ku mesu me butu si.
Guiziga: Irne ngi vu a jiɗ bilim bilim tir li gi mikuli nga muŋ. Modro ngi Bumbulvuŋ tuwa, a jiɗ asi irne ngi vu mibilim bilim nga muŋ, ar li gi mikuli tuwa ya. Manoa ati ngwas naŋ mupuraka keɗ na, a hurukom huruk huruk a ruwuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaake ɗemŋgal yiite ummi haa hirsirde man dilli dow, Manooha e debbo mum ngi'i malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo ɗon lorto haa asama nder ɗemŋgal yiite. Nden ɓe cujidi.
Fulfulde_DC: Yaake ɗemŋgal yiite ummi haa hirsirde man dilli dow, Manooha e debbo mum ngi'i malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo ɗon lorto haa asama nder ɗemŋgal yiite. Nden ɓe cujidi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ leɓe-wee daŋa nɛnɛ nɛ  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  si yiwese, betom ko GASA WAN daŋa nɛ̀ poo wee si yiwese. Manɔa in kóò kɔ‘i zɔka mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tik nù gu yí-wa nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ leɓe-wee daŋa nɛnɛ nɛ  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  si yiwese, betom ko GASA WAN daŋa nɛ̀ poo wee si yiwese. Manɔa in kóò kɔ‘i zɔka mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tik nù gu yí-wa nù.
Kapsiki_DC: geɗeɗe n'yia ghwə tagha kadzeme yitea ghweme, tarame nde ghwene ta Mahwətə pelɛ reghwetɛ hwa ghɛnia ghwə. Ma kwa nakɛ hɛ le male ta ŋkɛ, gwəɗəŋə hɛ ntiŋə ghə mbe hɛɗi.
Tupurri: De maga wuun de yaçaçge ciñ ti ngeel sii jagn mono, je peele Manwurn kal urgi wo ciñ nen wuu ma ti ngeel sii jag no. Manowa wo de waçy äe wo wo ko sen mokay, kal wo leëge gesiñ de mbuë nen äaara gesiñ.

Francais: Et l'Ange de Yahweh n'apparut plus à Manué et à sa femme. Alors Manué comprit que c'était l'Ange de Yahweh.
Anglais: But the angel of the  Lord  did no more appear to Manoah and to his wife. Then Manoah knew that he was an angel of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sunda-Wuralawna min vul tuwam kir Manohak hiɗi cata valam loɗi. Bugol kayni Manohak wi ala dolay kayni mi sunda-wuralawna.
Bulu: Ane Engele Nti a nga jañe Manôa ba e minga wé mis. Nde be nga yeme na a mbe Engele Nti;
Guiziga: I modro ngi Bumbulvuŋ na, Manoa a sla wala naŋ le muduba, ko modro ngi Bumbulvuŋ a biga vu da manowa ati ngwas naŋ mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe meetaay yi'ugo malaa'ikaajo man. Manooha faami ɗum malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe meetaay yi'ugo malaa'ikaajo man. Manooha faami ɗum malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Betom ko GASA WAN usi tɛ ha̧ Manɔa in kóò ɓɔna; nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ Manɔa iŋa nɛnɛ‘e, wi’ɛi nɛ́ betom ko GASA WAN nɛ mbetɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Betom ko GASA WAN usi tɛ ha̧ Manɔa in kóò ɓɔna; nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ Manɔa iŋa nɛnɛ‘e, wi’ɛi nɛ́ betom ko GASA WAN nɛ mbetɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe Manowa keɗepe tsetsenya gɛ kande ghwene ta Mahwətə ŋkɛ. Kezhɛne nde ghwene ta Shala kancɛ nda geva ke hɛ zhɛkwa we.
Tupurri: Je peele Manwurn kal yee nen Manowa wo go de waçy äe. Manowa raw koge so ga aà hay diñ je peele Manwuri.

Francais: Et Manué dit à sa femme : "Nous allons mourir, car nous avons vu Dieu."
Anglais: And Manoah said unto his wife, We shall surely die, because we have seen God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam di tam cata valamu: Yaya! Nay mitay ɗawn mitiya, kay iray cukawa kay Lawna.
Bulu: a Manôa a nga jô minga wé na: Bia zu foʼo wu, amu bi yeneya Zambe.
Guiziga: Manoa a ɓa ngwas naŋ: «Ko mbri na, i sa micam, asi i puraka Buymisemuŋ le.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Manooha wi'i debbo mum: “Fakat en maayan, ngam en ngi'i Allah.”
Fulfulde_DC: Manooha wi'i debbo mum: “Fakat en maayan, ngam en ngi'i Allah.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Manɔa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ kóò kɔ‘i: «Ɛɛ tɛ fe nɛ mbetɛ, wen n’ɛɛ zɔka Sɔ̧.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Manɔa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ kóò kɔ‘i: «Ɛɛ tɛ fe nɛ mbetɛ, wen n’ɛɛ zɔka Sɔ̧.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Manowa sha male ta ŋkɛ: «Ghəpə yite we, katempə mə kwa nza ŋkɛ na mə kenakɛ Shala.»
Tupurri: Manowa day riñ waçy äe gano: Cwaçy, na huë go werga naa ko Baa go de nen naa mono.

Francais: Sa femme lui répondit : "Si Yahweh voulait nous faire mourir, il n'aurait pas reçu de nos mains l'holocauste et l'oblation, il ne nous aurait pas fait voir tout cela, il ne nous aurait pas fait entendre aujourd'hui de pareilles choses."
Anglais: But his wife said unto him, If the  Lord  were pleased to kill us, he would not have received a burnt offering and a meat offering at our hands, neither would he have shewed us all these things, nor would as at this time have told us such things as these.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Cata valam ka hotom dita: Hay! Lali Ma-Vatɗin mini ala nay mitana, vulda hiɗi ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna ma nay lum talamna nam as vum lo su? Lebo nam as a hinay ɗuw slen namna hiɗi iraya humum hiɗi humaya pet lo su?
Bulu: Nde minga wé a nga yalane nye na: Nge Nti a nga kômbô na bi wu, ve a nji ke ye nyoñe mon ékela a avut e mo mangan, a nji ke ye kañese na bi yene mam mana mese a a nji ke ye bo éyoñe jina na bi wôʼô mam mete.
Guiziga: Amma ngwas naŋ ɓaŋ: «Da Bumbulvuŋ a wuɗ di i muc ndra na, anja a tiɓa mikuli ndra mizlam zlam ati gwat ngi vul ndra na ta, anja zleˀe a biga ndra gwat tayna gar ta, yo a ɓa ndra ɓihey na ta.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa debbo maako wi'i mo: “To Jawmiraawo ɗaɓɓino mbarugo en, o jaɓataano nguleteeŋga e dokkal nyaamdu haa juuɗe men, o yi'nataano en kuuje ɗe'e fuu, o anndintaano en haala ka boo jonta.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa debbo maako wi'i mo: “To Jawmiraawo ɗaɓɓino mbarugo en, o jaɓataano nguleteeŋga e dokkal nyaamdu haa juuɗe men, o yi'nataano en kuuje ɗe'e fuu, o anndintaano en haala ka boo jonta.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kóò kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Kà bó só ha̧ GASA WAN mɛ gbɛ yɛ, bo nɛ a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpɛk  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  in ha̧a̧mɔ k’ɛɛ na. A̧ beka usi so mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ h’ɛ́ɛ́ na in bo nɛ a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ so mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi’ɛ na.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kóò kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Kà bó só ha̧ GASA WAN mɛ gbɛ yɛ, bo nɛ a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpɛk  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  in ha̧a̧mɔ k’ɛɛ na. A̧ beka usi so mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ h’ɛ́ɛ́ na in bo nɛ a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ so mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi’ɛ na.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke male ta ŋkɛ: «Ma keɗe Mahwətə kampə ɓə ne, nza kakele melɛ ɓə kwa tere tere nya ŋkɛ le kweci wəshi nyi we. Nza ashɛ kancɛ wəshi nyi nakɛ nyi mə le nyi gezete ɓə ŋkɛ kafate mə we.»
Tupurri: Waçy äe kal ferge ne hen gano: Hayga Manwur de da we ga se ii naa go no, aà de yaçaç do naa de siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy wo de fen haçgen gaè. A de joñ ga naa mo ko feçeçre sen wo mo deñ äuy gaa lay, de joñ ga naa mo laa feçeçre se deñ wo gaa lay.

Francais: La femme enfanta un fils et lui donna le nom de Samson. L'enfant grandit et Yahweh le bénit;
Anglais: And the woman bare a son, and called his name Samson: and the child grew, and the  Lord  blessed him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Cata vuɗ goor namna, na' tunum selem ala Samson, nam wul kulo'o. Ma-Vatɗina gi bol kalamu.
Bulu: Ane minga a nga biaé monafam a yôlé nye jôé na Samson. Nde mon
Guiziga: Ngwas ngi Manoa a yi mangal mizile, a zila Samsoŋ. Mangal ara gil, yo Bumbulvuŋ a ɗuwulaŋ mi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Debbo Manooha danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko, inndi mo Samson. Ɓiŋngel man mawni, Jawmiraawo barkiɗini ngel.
Fulfulde_DC: Debbo Manooha danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko, inndi mo Samson. Ɓiŋngel man mawni, Jawmiraawo barkiɗini ngel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kóò‘i koo nɛ̀ be-wiwii, ɓɛɛ a̧ a nin-a nɛ Samsɔŋ. Bem gasa, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tok de yoŋgo ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kóò‘i koo nɛ̀ be-wiwii, ɓɛɛ a̧ a nin-a nɛ Samsɔŋ. Bem gasa, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tok de yoŋgo ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa male ta Manowa yake wəzege teza ba'a hekate nda slə kaSamson. Kakele wəzegea shɛ, pa Mahwətə wəpikɛ.
Tupurri: Waçyn raw biñ weele, se kal kañ ëu ne hen ga Samsoñ. Weeln kal geçeçge go, Manwur raw kañ bosa' ne hen ti.

Francais: l'esprit de Yahweh commença à le pousser à Machanêh-Dan, entre Saraa et Esthaol.
Anglais: And the Spirit of the  Lord  began to move him at times in the camp of Dan between Zorah and Eshtaol.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay Makane-Dan jar Soreya hiɗi Estahol kayni, Ŋusta vi Lawna tun caw vum tuwam bat-bat'.
Bulu: a nga yaé a Nti a nga botane nye. A Nsisime Zambe ô nga taté na wo fôʼô nye e Mahané-Dañ, e zañe Soréa a Estaol.
Guiziga: Ti di numuŋ ada na, Samsoŋ naŋ ar walahay guɗuk ngi Daŋ, ar wala ngi Sora ati Esetaˀol, ˀUf ngi Bumbulvuŋ mihizigiɗaŋ, ɓa a gi gwat sar mudumbuŋ na a diga.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaake o ɗonno haa saŋngeere Dan hakkunde Cor'a bee Estawol, Ruuhu Jawmiraawo fuɗɗi huuwugo nder maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Yaake o ɗonno haa saŋngeere Dan hakkunde Cor'a bee Estawol, Ruuhu Jawmiraawo fuɗɗi huuwugo nder maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ sɛn Mahane-Dan, mgbara Sore in Ɛstaɔl a̧  Ɔmi  ko GASA WAN ku̧u̧ nɛ naŋ dee tom tɛ Samsɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ sɛn Mahane-Dan, mgbara Sore in Ɛstaɔl a̧  Ɔmi  ko GASA WAN ku̧u̧ nɛ naŋ dee tom tɛ Samsɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwete hɛ kwa nza Samson mbe ghedəkwəa Dan, kwelɛ yɛ Sora le Ɛshetawol, pa Sefəa Mahwətə ghate kagagəzə ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Nenterse Manwur tï¡ï¡ age ne hen ti äi leege Mahane-Dañ, ti holañ Soreya wo de Estawole.

Francais: Samson descendit à Thamna, et il vit à Thamna une femme d'entre les filles des Philistins.
Anglais: And Samson went down to Timnah, and saw a woman in Timnah of the daughters of the Philistines.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Samson tun iram hay Timna, iram wi goot cat kep jar gurona vi sa Filistina.
Bulu: Ane Samson a nga ke e Timna a yene minga ya luk e bengone Befilisteñ été.
Guiziga: Ti di numuŋ ada na, Samsoŋ aru nga Timna, a pur zuŋ diili a wuzla ziri diili Filistihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyalaade woɗnde Samson yehi Timna, ton o yi'i paanyo debbo Filistiijo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyalaade woɗnde Samson yehi Timna, ton o yi'i paanyo debbo Filistiijo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Samsɔŋ zira si Timna, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk ŋma be-okoo mgbara o be-zɔŋa Filistii.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Samsɔŋ zira si Timna, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk ŋma be-okoo mgbara o be-zɔŋa Filistii.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Samson dzawa Timna, pa nakɛ kwete wəzha makwa nya ɗe ŋkɛ hwa ŋwalea kwɛa ka Filisti.
Tupurri: Samsoñ raw woge Timna, nen äe kal baa waçy yoo mayre mani jar Filisteçeçn wo ni.

Francais: Lorsqu'il fut remonté, il le déclara à son père et à sa mère, en disant : "J'ai vu à Thamna une femme d'entre les filles des Philistins; prenez-la maintenant pour être ma femme."
Anglais: And he came up, and told his father and his mother, and said, I have seen a woman in Timnah of the daughters of the Philistines: now therefore get her for me to wife.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nam hotay vo hotna, nam di goy tam bulum hiɗi sulum ala, hay Timna nam wi goot cat kep jar guro-boyna vi Filistina, iram va'a, nam ala nisi ma slumta.
Bulu: Eyoñ a nga bulan, a nga kate de ésaa ba nyia a jô na: me yeneya minga ya luk e Timna e bengone Befilisteñ été: Nyoñane nye éyoñe ji a bo minga wom.
Guiziga: Ti naŋ mumo na, a ɓa miyi naŋhaya: «Yi pur zuŋ diili le a wuzla diili Filistiheye. Wurenna, ara zuɓikiy di ngi ngwasa.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O hooti, o wi'i baaba e daada maako: “Caka Filisti'en haa Timna mi yi'i paanyo debbo, te'aneeɗam mo.”
Fulfulde_DC: O hooti, o wi'i baaba e daada maako: “Caka Filisti'en haa Timna mi yi'i paanyo debbo, te'aneeɗam mo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ daŋa nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ dáà in nàà kɔ̧-a̧‘e, wi zɔka ŋma be-okoo mgbara o be-zɔŋa Filistii sɛn Timna, wa a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ ba a̧ ha'i nɛ kóò.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ daŋa nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ dáà in nàà kɔ̧-a̧‘e, wi zɔka ŋma be-okoo mgbara o be-zɔŋa Filistii sɛn Timna, wa a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ ba a̧ ha'i nɛ kóò.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa se ŋkɛ ne, pa gezete nda ke mbeli nyi keyake: «Nahe 'ya kenakɛ kwete wəzha makwa kwa Timna, kaɗe 'ya kadzawa yɛ ka'yɛwe ɗa.»
Tupurri: De maga se fer le mono, se raw sii ree sen ne pan äe wo de man äe gano: Nen äi baa waçy we le Timna yoo mayre mani jar Filisteçeçn wo. Patala kañn wee me waçy.

Francais: Son père et sa mère lui dirent : "N'y a-t-il point de femme parmi les filles de tes frères et dans tout notre peuple, que tu ailles prendre une femme chez les Philistins, qui sont incirconcis?" Et Samson dit à son père : "Prends celle-là pour moi, car elle me plaît."
Anglais: Then his father and his mother said unto him, Is there never a woman among the daughters of thy brethren, or among all my people, that thou goest to take a wife of the uncircumcised Philistines? And Samson said unto his father, Get her for me; for she pleaseth me well.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bulum hiɗi sulum ka dumu: Jar guro-biyoŋŋa hiɗi sumuna vaŋ noŋ kaf kayn guro-boyn sayɗi su? Lebo naŋ tuɗ goy sli goot jar sum sa Filistina sa bay ka gosayna kayni kay mige? Samson hot di bulumu: Slanti migi hay', kay na' kiran ŋaa'a ŋolo.
Bulu: Ane ésaa ba nyia be nga jô nye na: Ye minga ya luk a se nguleya yené e be bengone be bobenyoñ a ayoñe dangan ese été, sa na ô ke nyoñe minga ya luk e be Befilisteñ, bôt be ne te ntyiʼibane metyele bete? Ane Samson a nga yalan ésaa na: Nyoñe nye asu dam, amu nye a yiane ma.
Guiziga: Miyi naŋhay a ɓakaŋ: «Ɓa hã ki ra zuɓ ngwasa a wuzla Filisti manja ci mizaway na, diili ngi zuɓo anta a wuzla ziri diili ngi sukum ɗikey ati muy ndraˀahaya ta kwa?» Amma Samsoŋ a ɓa cine: «Yi hiyĩ nga ya i naŋ, ara zuɓiy di ngi ngwasa.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saaro'en maako ƴami mo: “Walaa paanyo debbo nder banndiraaɓe ma malla nder ummaatoore meeɗen na? Koni ɗaɓɓata debbo haa Filisti'en saadooni'en ɓe'e?” Samson jaabi baaba muuɗum: “Kaŋko fottani yam, te'anam mo!”
Fulfulde_DC: Saaro'en maako ƴami mo: “Walaa paanyo debbo nder banndiraaɓe ma malla nder ummaatoore meeɗen na? Koni ɗaɓɓata debbo haa Filisti'en saadooni'en ɓe'e?” Samson jaabi baaba muuɗum: “Kaŋko fottani yam, te'anam mo!”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dáà in nàà kɔ̧-a̧ aka a̧: «Okoo bo mgbara o boko-bem ko o nya-mɛ in sɛn mgbara o nam kɔ-mɛ na, sa mɛ tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ba nɛ zɔŋa Filistii tɛ o wi-mbii nde?» Samsɔŋ kifa nú ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá a̧ ha̧‘m; nɛ́ a̧ a̧ dee tɛ‘m.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dáà in nàà kɔ̧-a̧ aka a̧: «Okoo bo mgbara o boko-bem ko o nya-mɛ in sɛn mgbara o nam kɔ-mɛ na, sa mɛ tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ba nɛ zɔŋa Filistii tɛ o wi-mbii nde?» Samsɔŋ kifa nú ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá a̧ ha̧‘m; nɛ́ a̧ a̧ dee tɛ‘m.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke mbeli nyi keyake shɛ: «Gha ndɛare va wəzha makwa kwa yita ta ŋa ba'a mbe hwelefe ta ŋa, nda lə na kanta hwa ka Filisti nyi kaka slamtema mɓɛta na?» Ma ke Samson sha yitenyɛ: «Ghenta yaɗe 'ya, kwiɗi ka'yɛwe kawəme ɗa.»
Tupurri: Pan äe wo de man äe kal wo wiigi äe gana: Waçy bay baa yoo mayre mani heçeçre äon wo noga ti wer mani äon ba la wa has nen maga ndo wo da waçy say ni jar Filisteçeç ma bay caa äï¡ï¡ni wo yawla? Samsoñ day wii pan äe gana: Kañn mbo me waçy werga baa nen äi na diñ se.

Francais: Son père et sa mère ne savaient pas que cela venait de Yahweh ; car il cherchait une occasion de querelle venant des Philistins. - En ce temps-là les Philistins dominaient sur Israël.
Anglais: But his father and his mother knew not that it was of the  Lord , that he sought an occasion against the Philistines: for at that time the Philistines had dominion over Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bulum hiɗi sulum may wi ala lawt kayn may goy vi Lawn paɗi, dolay Samson gar kayni mi yalla ma curob jaram hiɗi sa Filistina, kay hay liy namna kayni, sa Filistina ka ti mulda kay sa Israyella.
Bulu: Esaa ba nyia be nji yeme na jame te da so be Nti: Amu Samson a nga jeñe zene ya bo mintañete a Befilisteñ. Melu mete Befilisteñ be nga titi Israél yôp.
Guiziga: Miga ɓa Samsoŋ a hiyĩ zuŋ Filisti i Bumbulvuŋ na, ti cine ati mumuŋ a si na ka ta Buymisemuŋ a sipi di i jiviɗ ngi zlira taŋ ngi gi vurum ati Filistiheye. Ti nah na Filistihey a paka hirnga le da Israyeleye.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saaro'en Samson anndaa nii ɗum Jawmiraawo waɗi yelo ngo nder ɓiɗɗo maɓɓe haa o heɓa dabare haɓugo bee Filisti'en. Ngam saa'i maajum Filisti'en ɗon laamano Isra'iila'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Saaro'en Samson anndaa nii ɗum Jawmiraawo waɗi yelo ngo nder ɓiɗɗo maɓɓe haa o heɓa dabare haɓugo bee Filisti'en. Ngam saa'i maajum Filisti'en ɗon laamano Isra'iila'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dáà kɔ̧-a̧ in nàà kɔ̧-a̧ iŋ so kɔ‘i'e, mɔ‘i tɛ́ nɛ tɛ GASA WAN na, wen Sɔ̧ kii so nɛ ŋma yuwar mɛ bi o be Filistii. Ŋgimbi'i o be Filistii kpaa so ŋgai zu o be  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dáà kɔ̧-a̧ in nàà kɔ̧-a̧ iŋ so kɔ‘i'e, mɔ‘i tɛ́ nɛ tɛ GASA WAN na, wen Sɔ̧ kii so nɛ ŋma yuwar mɛ bi o be Filistii. Ŋgimbi'i o be Filistii kpaa so ŋgai zu o be  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ yitenyɛ le meghekɛ ne, keɗepe hɛ Mahwətə le ghəa ŋkɛ nde veyi zəzəa shɛ mbe Samson we, kwa nza ŋkɛ kazele hweŋkwa keghəpə le ka Filisti. Kwa nza ŋkɛ vəa kwa shɛ, ka Filisti ka sleke ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Pan äe wo de man äe hay bay wo de koge ga joñ ree sen diñ Manwur wa werga Samsoñ hay kiëgi na diñ ga wuy mo kañ ti holañ saara de jar Filisteçeç wo. De sen ni mono, jar Filisteçeç hay wo waçaç ree jar Israyel wo.

Francais: Samson descendit avec son père et sa mère à Thamna. Lorsqu'ils arrivèrent aux vignes de Thamna, voici qu'un jeune lion rugissant vint à sa rencontre.
Anglais: Then went Samson down, and his father and his mother, to Timnah, and came to the vineyards of Timnah: and, behold, a young lion roared against him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Samson kali hay Timna hiɗi bulumu hiɗi sulumu. Hay li ma nisi co hay sine gulda-guldana vi sa Timna, zlon ma joriyona ci gumu, nam kali goyo, ŋaf ir Samson.
Bulu: Ane Samson, ésaa a nyia be nga ke e Timna a kui mefube mindiʼi mi woon ya Timna; be kelek, atemetem étoñ ngbwengbwem é bamek, é nga zu vôm be mbe.
Guiziga: Akẽh Samsoŋ a ram ati miyi naŋhay nga Timna so. Ti taŋ mindilam ar guva ngi gudubun ngi Timnahay na, zingaˀ ngi mobor a bo ti Samsoŋ gur ti tuwuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Samson e saaro'en muuɗum ɗon njaha Timna, ɓe ɗon tokki laawol kommbi gese inabooje Timna, mbarooga wurti bee ubbaaŋgo, fotti bee Samson.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Samson e saaro'en muuɗum ɗon njaha Timna, ɓe ɗon tokki laawol kommbi gese inabooje Timna, mbarooga wurti bee ubbaaŋgo, fotti bee Samson.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Samsɔŋ in dáà kɔ‘i ká bá nɛ̀ nàà kɔ‘i zir so zir si Timna; wa hɔɔ kpɛɛfɔ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ Timna, ɓɛɛ ŋma daŋa ŋgai dila we ti wa tɛnɛ de nɛ da̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Samsɔŋ in dáà kɔ‘i ká bá nɛ̀ nàà kɔ‘i zir so zir si Timna; wa hɔɔ kpɛɛfɔ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ Timna, ɓɛɛ ŋma daŋa ŋgai dila we ti wa tɛnɛ de nɛ da̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa yɛ Samson le mbeli nyi keyake ŋkɛ slə kadzembe Timna. Ma hwa'a hɛ mbe wəvea rɛzɛŋe takwa takwa yitea ŋkwa shɛ, pɛkwe nivɛrə nya kawəzege se le ghwəghwə kabegeme le.
Tupurri: Samsoñ kal wo rawge de pan äe wo de man äe Timna. Day de maga saara wo go äil pay tlalum ma Timna wo mono, kola mingir ma joçoç po raw caa pel äe le caw buçëgi.

Francais: L'Esprit de Yahweh saisit Samson ; et, sans avoir rien à la main, Samson déchira le lion comme on déchire un chevreau. Et il ne raconta pas à son père et à sa mère ce qu'il avait fait.
Anglais: And the Spirit of the  Lord  came mightily upon him, and he rent him as he would have rent a kid, and he had nothing in his hand: but he told not his father or his mother what he had done.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ŋusta vi Ma-Vatɗina cuk kay Samson; nam vi zlona, hawam goyo ki san haw goor ɦun ɦawa nala. Va ma nam lumna nam min dum mi bulum hiɗi sulum noŋɗi.
Bulu: Nde Nsisime Zambe ô nga bi Samson; Samson a nji bi jôme mo, nde a nga nyabe ngbwengbwem ane ba nyabe mon ékela. Ve a nji kate ésaa a nyia jam a nga bo.
Guiziga: (ˀUf) ngi Bumbulvuŋ a ci avu Samsoŋ, manja gwat kaw a haŋ si na, Samsoŋ a wursla mobor tuwa, wurasl a wuzla cuw, kaɓa i zuŋ ˀawa si. Amma ko a ɓa ɓi ngi gwat naŋ miga nah, da miyi naŋhaya ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ruuhu Jawmiraawo naŋngi Samson, o naŋngi mbarooga man o sampiti nga bee juuɗe cooke, bana goɗɗo sampitirta jawgel. Ammaa o wi'aay saaro'en maako ko o waɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ruuhu Jawmiraawo naŋngi Samson, o naŋngi mbarooga man o sampiti nga bee juuɗe cooke, bana goɗɗo sampitirta jawgel. Ammaa o wi'aay saaro'en maako ko o waɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɔmi  ko GASA WAN yee tɛ Samsɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧k dila nɛ géé er-a tɛ fara yiitoo hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i a̧k nɛ be gbadua’ɛ ga. A̧ tɔ̧ mɔ n'aa dea'i ha̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ in nàà kɔ̧-a̧ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɔmi  ko GASA WAN yee tɛ Samsɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧k dila nɛ géé er-a tɛ fara yiitoo hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i a̧k nɛ be gbadua’ɛ ga. A̧ tɔ̧ mɔ n'aa dea'i ha̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ in nàà kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Sefəa Mahwətə dzembenyɛ mbe Samson, le dzeve pala pala, pa slekwemte nivɛrə kala wəsə nya nza ŋkɛ kazhɛfa gəmə. Kese kancɛ nda wəsə nya menete ŋkɛ ke mbeli nyi keyake we.
Tupurri: Nenterse Manwur raw age ne Samsoñ ti, se plaw mingirn go doga aà plaw weelfii go nono, mopo ma durgi hay bay do äe wa has äuy. Se day sii fen maga se joñn ne pan äe wo de man äe gaa hase.

Francais: Il descendit et parla à la femme, et elle lui plut.
Anglais: And he went down, and talked with the woman; and she pleased Samson well.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam kaliya, ka kasla hiɗi ca na'ta, iram va' ŋaa'a ŋolo.
Bulu: Ane a nga ke a kobô minga, a a nga yene minga ate mvaé.
Guiziga: Joˀ a zuɓa jiviɗ naŋ nga Timna, ara bubuɗam ati zuŋ Filisti tuwa, a hĩyã zuŋ le haɗa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Samson yehi, wolidi bee paanyo debbo go, paanyo boo fottani mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Samson yehi, wolidi bee paanyo debbo go, paanyo boo fottani mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ zira si Timna tɔ̧ wen ha̧ kóò‘i, ɓɛɛ kóò‘i ba see-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ zira si Timna tɔ̧ wen ha̧ kóò‘i, ɓɛɛ kóò‘i ba see-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ntəŋə yitea dzeghwa ta ŋkɛ kadzawa kagezete nda ke wəzha ta ka Filistia shɛ, kwele kwele zlama nde te.
Tupurri: Se kal woge ndal waçy no, waçyn kal baa nen äe.

Francais: Quelque temps après, s'étant rendu de nouveau à Thamna pour la prendre, il fit un détour pour voir le cadavre du lion, et voici qu'il y avait un essaim d'abeilles et du miel dans le corps du lion.
Anglais: And after a time he returned to take her, and he turned aside to see the carcase of the lion: and, behold, there was a swarm of bees and honey in the carcase of the lion.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol buur neeɗa kayni, nam hot hay Timna kay sli cata valamu, nam cal goyo kay tuɗ ɗuw ŋumna vi zlon ma nam cumna. Nam ɗuw na kayni, yumna ka viya hay hoyok zlon namna, liy mul ŋolo.
Bulu: Melu me lôteya, ane Samson a nga beta ke e Timna na a nyoñe minga, nde a nga ke fefele zene na a yene mbime ngbwengbwem. A nga koone na mbame mvôfôm ô too ngbwengbwem nyô été, wôé ô maneya fe bo été.
Guiziga: A gam hin neˀ na, Samsoŋ a mo nga Timna, ɓa a zuɓa zuŋ tuwa. Amma aru bal avu maara ngi mobor tuwa, keɗ na, mam ɗap ɗap liw avu tesl ngi mobor mi ngiyam tuwa waɗ mamalam naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyalɗe seɗɗa ɓaawoɗon o yehi fahin ngam haa o ɓaŋga mo. O seli laawol haa o laara caaɗŋgu mbarooga go. O yi'i udumre nyaaki e njumri ɗon nder caaɗŋgu man.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyalɗe seɗɗa ɓaawoɗon o yehi fahin ngam haa o ɓaŋga mo. O seli laawol haa o laara caaɗŋgu mbarooga go. O yi'i udumre nyaaki e njumri ɗon nder caaɗŋgu man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zɛ tikiɗi ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Samsɔŋ pia ɗoŋ mɛ ba kóò kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧r benaŋ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk wɔr dila'i. A̧ kpaa nɛ toka-baa-gɔrɔ in kiitɛ yí-gɔrɔ kɔ̧ akara-okoro dila'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zɛ tikiɗi ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Samsɔŋ pia ɗoŋ mɛ ba kóò kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧r benaŋ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk wɔr dila'i. A̧ kpaa nɛ toka-baa-gɔrɔ in kiitɛ yí-gɔrɔ kɔ̧ akara-okoro dila'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta hɛ ɓɛhwɛ, cape kadzawa Timna kezha wəme male. Kwa hweŋkwa ŋkɛ, pa dzawanyɛ hwa gamba kezha newe mahwama ta nivɛrə. Pa nakɛ mze le yɛmə mbe, mbe mahwama ta nivɛrəa shɛ.
Tupurri: Naw wo mañge mbag blam sen mono, Samsoñ kal ferge Timna ma woge baa waçy äe no. Se raw celge go ko har mingir no. Ko la yoçoçre wo de dembolge ti keçeç äil äe ni ta' de kañ noo.

Francais: Il en prit dans ses mains et en mangea chemin faisant; et lorsqu'il fut arrivé près de son père et de sa mère, il leur en donna et ils en mangèrent; mais il ne leur dit pas qu'il avait pris le miel dans le corps du lion.
Anglais: And he took thereof in his hands, and went on eating, and came to his father and mother, and he gave them, and they did eat: but he told not them that he had taken the honey out of the carcase of the lion.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam pat yum namna yawam hay ɓalamu, nam ka ti'e hay li ma nam ka tuɗ hay hagata; hay li ma nam co tam bulum hiɗi sulumu, nam vulsiya nisi ti kaw. May nam may disi ala yum namna nam patamay hay hoyok zlona paɗi.
Bulu: Ane a nga nyoñe wôé e mo mé a di wô e zenezen; éyoñ a nga kui e bʼésaa a nyia, a nga ve be wô, be ve nyoñ a di. Ve Samson a nji kate be na a nga nyoñe wôé te e nyôle ngbwengbwem été.
Guiziga: A muɗa mamalama ceɗ ceɗ jup a haŋ, dar aru bal ti zum naŋ. Ti naŋ mindil a hay miyi naŋhay na, a vula taŋ mam tuwa ya, miyi naŋhay a zumam. Amma a ɓa taŋ di, i muɗo di ar tesl ngi mobor mingiyam na, a ɓa taŋ di ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O hoo'i njumri bee juŋngo maako, o ɗon nyaama saa'i o ɗon yaha dow laawol. O yehi haa saaro'en maako, o hokki ɓe, kamɓe boo ɓe nyaami. Ammaa o yeccaay ɓe o njumti njumri man haa caaɗŋgu mbarooga.
Fulfulde_DC: O hoo'i njumri bee juŋngo maako, o ɗon nyaama saa'i o ɗon yaha dow laawol. O yehi haa saaro'en maako, o hokki ɓe, kamɓe boo ɓe nyaami. Ammaa o yeccaay ɓe o njumti njumri man haa caaɗŋgu mbarooga.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Samsɔŋ bìí gɔrɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kai nɛ er nyɔŋ yak nɛnɛ. A̧ hɔɔ tɛ ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ in nàà kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ŋma ha̧ wa nyɔŋ. A̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa'e wi bìí gɔrɔ‘i kɔ̧ akara-okoro dila na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Samsɔŋ bìí gɔrɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kai nɛ er nyɔŋ yak nɛnɛ. A̧ hɔɔ tɛ ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ in nàà kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ŋma ha̧ wa nyɔŋ. A̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa'e wi bìí gɔrɔ‘i kɔ̧ akara-okoro dila na.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ taweve yɛməa mze te hwə dzeve ta ŋkɛ ba'a zehwe ŋkɛ vəa ŋkwa nya dzeghwa ŋkɛ kase sha ghɛ. Pa kekave mbeli nyi keyake pa ŋkɛ ndeke nda ke hɛ kazeme, ama kese kageze nda ke mbeli nyi keyake mbe mahwama ta nivɛrə mtseke 'ya ke we.
Tupurri: Se kal naage noo yoçoçren do äe soän wo ti faage. De maga se wo da' pan äe wo de man äe mono, se raw haçge ne hara lay, saara raw soäge lay. Ane se kañ nen äaara ga se naa noo yoçoçren le äil har mingirn gaè.

Francais: Le père de Samson descendit chez la femme; et là, Samson donna un festin, car c'était la coutume des jeunes gens.
Anglais: So his father went down unto the woman: and Samson made there a feast; for so used the young men to do.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bum Samson tuɗ goy vi cata, ɗawni Samson li yuldeta kay sa joriyona ay li dok-dok nala.
Bulu: Esaa Samson a nga ke e jañ be mona minga. Samson a nga bo beta dina wé, amu nalé nye bisoé bendôman bi nga bo bi boʼok.
Guiziga: Cine ngi Samsoŋ aru ng'avi zuŋ diili Filisti tuwa so. Samsoŋ kwana, a da gwat ngi kisa ngwasa, kaɓa gawla ati diilihey magaka hõyyõ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Baaba Samson yehi haa saare paanyo debbo go, Samson boo taaski nyaamduuji ɓaŋgal ton, bana sukaaɓe mboowi waɗugo.
Fulfulde_DC: Baaba Samson yehi haa saare paanyo debbo go, Samson boo taaski nyaamduuji ɓaŋgal ton, bana sukaaɓe mboowi waɗugo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dáà ko Samsɔŋ zira si tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Samsɔŋ de gbaŋa hi̧i̧, wen nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o be-ŋgaiwi de nɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dáà ko Samsɔŋ zira si tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Samsɔŋ de gbaŋa hi̧i̧, wen nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o be-ŋgaiwi de nɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa yitenyɛa Samson lə sha wəzha ta ka Filisti. Pa Samson menete veghe kwele kwele, kala nya seneve ka mempɛhwetɛti kamene hwa makwa.
Tupurri: Pan Samsoñ kal woge ti ngeel waçy no. Samsoñ kal joñ few wo ni werga weere ma joçoçre hay wo joñge dosen nono.

Francais: Dès qu'on le vit, on invita trente compagnons pour être avec lui.
Anglais: And it came to pass, when they saw him, that they brought thirty companions to be with him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nisi wumu, nisi yi sa joriyon dok-ɦidi, nisi co'o nal hiɗi namu:
Bulu: Eyoñe Befilisteñ be nga yene Samson, nde be nga tobe bôte mewôm mela ba be be be tabe.
Guiziga: Filistihey mupuraka Samsoŋ keɗ sina, a hilam gawla kukur makir aseˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Filisti'en ngi'i Samson, ɓe neli sukaaɓe cappanɗe tato ngam haa ɓe ngonda bee maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Filisti'en ngi'i Samson, ɓe neli sukaaɓe cappanɗe tato ngam haa ɓe ngonda bee maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ wa zɔka a̧, wa hoka o be-ŋgaiwi ɓu-taar mɛ ya in a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ wa zɔka a̧, wa hoka o be-ŋgaiwi ɓu-taar mɛ ya in a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa nakɛ ka Filisti ne, pa hɛ tsehave ka mempɛhwetɛti mahekenemsə kezha nza hɛ le.
Tupurri: De maga jar Filisteçeç kon wo mokay saara raw hoo kaçaçre äe wo do swa' ma lagge ti jeñ äe.

Francais: Samson leur dit : "Je vais vous proposer une énigme. Si vous me l'expliquez pendant les sept jours du festin et si vous la devinez, je vous donnerai trente tuniques et trente vêtements de rechange;
Anglais: And Samson said unto them, I will now put forth a riddle unto you: if ye can certainly declare it me within the seven days of the feast, and find it out, then I will give you thirty sheets and thirty change of garments:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Samson disiya: Nan min digi vanbona, kay nigi dum cawam goyo, jar buur ma siɗiyana vi yuldet lakŋi, la nigi dum cawamawa goyo na, nan ma vulgi sligar fiyok ma cuk hoyokgi dok-ɦidi lay, vulgi sligar ma muɗumna dok-ɦidi lay.
Bulu: Samson a nga jô be na: Ma zu solé mia ba, mi ve ma atinan yʼété nté melu zañgbwa dina a ye tabe, nge mi yene atinan yʼété, ma ye ve mia melôʼô mewôm mela a mengômesan mi ne boʼo mi folaʼan mewôm mela.
Guiziga: Samsoŋ a ɓa taŋ: «Y'ani wuɗ i ɓukum ɓi ngi kicuwul ani. Da ki mikiy ti mbiɗebra naŋ le angi hin mitarnaˀ ngi muguzlum ngi kisa ngwas hana na, i sa vulukum godohoy kukur makir waɗ zana kukur makir, da ngi kumoy a jupam le na, kisa kaka taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Samson wi'i ɓe: “Mi waɗanan on annditanamwol. To on keɓti ngol, on annditini yam ngol nder nyalɗe juulde joweeɗiɗi, nden kam mi hokkan on toggooje cappanɗe tati e ngapaleeji cappanɗe tati.
Fulfulde_DC: Samson wi'i ɓe: “Mi waɗanan on annditanamwol. To on keɓti ngol, on annditini yam ngol nder nyalɗe juulde joweeɗiɗi, nden kam mi hokkan on toggooje cappanɗe tati e ngapaleeji cappanɗe tati.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Samsɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mi tɛ sa ŋma sumgba h’ɛ́nɛ́. K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧ sumgba'i ha̧‘m zaŋ zɛ gbaŋa nɔ'ɔ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo’ɛ, mi tɛ ha̧ laa h’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓu-taar in wan mɛ kpaia-a ɓu-taar mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Samsɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mi tɛ sa ŋma sumgba h’ɛ́nɛ́. K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧ sumgba'i ha̧‘m zaŋ zɛ gbaŋa nɔ'ɔ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo’ɛ, mi tɛ ha̧ laa h’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓu-taar in wan mɛ kpaia-a ɓu-taar mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Samson sha hɛ: «'Ya kategeze ŋayɛ kwete ghena nya mbe ghena. Ma keɗepete yɛ ne, kave ŋayɛ karalame 'ya mahekenemsə, ɓiyitsa, mahekenemsə tɛagware. Ma nda nza yɛ kakemave ne, pa yɛ ɗepete ghena nya mbe ghena mpelɛa ma ke kwa mberefaŋe ta hɛa veghe ta makwa.
Tupurri: Samsoñ day wii ra gano: Ndi waçaç jag joçoç po wee. Hayga nday äo' wer äe we go nen naw few ma kluu ma renam wo la, day nday da' wer äe we go no, ni ndi haç ge simis wo yañ ne nday do swa' de oçoçbe few wo ni do swa' lay.

Francais: mais si vous me pouvez pas me l'expliquer, c'est vous qui me donnerez trente tuniques et trente vêtements de rechange." Ils lui dirent "Propose ton énigme, que nous l'entendions."
Anglais: But if ye cannot declare it me, then shall ye give me thirty sheets and thirty change of garments. And they said unto him, Put forth thy riddle, that we may hear it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May la nigi fi a danti cawam goyɗina, sligar ma cukŋa dok-ɦidi hiɗi sligar ma muɗumna dok-ɦidi lay vulanti ɗawn si nigiya. Nisi dumu: Daŋ law ma zul namna aya, numa humum tuwa. Nam di'e:
Bulu: Ve nge mia bo te yen atinan yʼété, mia mia ye ve ma melôʼô mewôm mela a mengômesan me ne boʼo me folaʼan mewôm mela. Nde be nga jô nye na: Vaʼa bia asoé ba, bia ye wôʼô de.
Guiziga: Amma da ki lumaka mbiɗeˀvra naŋ ta na, i kum masa vulikiy godohoy kukur makir waɗ zana kukur makir ngi mbiɗa nga yahaya ya.» Taŋ a ɓakaŋ so na: «Ɓo ndra ɓi ngi kicuwul ɗike, i ra cinam.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa to on mbaawaay waŋginango yam ngol, nden kam koo moy mooɗon hokkammi toggoore e ngapaleewol.” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Waɗ annditanamwol ma haa min nana ngol.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa to on mbaawaay waŋginango yam ngol, nden kam koo moy mooɗon hokkammi toggoore e ngapaleewol.” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Waɗ annditanamwol ma haa min nana ngol.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m na, nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ tɛ ha̧ laa nɔ‘i ha̧‘m.» Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ sá sumgba kɔ-mɛ‘i ɛ̀ɛ̀ zii.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m na, nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ tɛ ha̧ laa nɔ‘i ha̧‘m.» Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ sá sumgba kɔ-mɛ‘i ɛ̀ɛ̀ zii.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma keshaŋe yɛ va zhɛnete ɗa, gheyɛ katefə ɗa karalame mahekenemsə ba'a tɛagware mahekenemsə.» Ma ke ka Filisti sha Samson: «Gezete ghena ta ŋa nya mbe ghena shɛ, kafa ghen'yɛ.»
Tupurri: Ama, hayga nday kaçaç ge we ma äo' wer äe go gaa no, nday haç ge simis wo me do swa' de oçoçbe few wo do swa' lay. Saara kal wiigi äe ga waçaç mbo jag joçoç äo no, day wuur co' mbe sug äe yañ.

Francais: Il leur dit : Pendant trois jours, ils me purent expliquer l'énigme.
Anglais: And he said unto them, Out of the eater came forth meat, and out of the strong came forth sweetness. And they could not in three days expound the riddle.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goy hay nam ma mut slen pa va ma tin kali goyo, goy hay nam ma donon pa va ma lumaɗna kali goyo. Nisi garam cawam ta-ta buur ɦidi, may fumɗi.
Bulu: Ane a nga jô na: jôm ja diban é nga so anyu ya nyô a di, a jôm é nʼévôvoé é nga so e be jôm é nʼayok. Tañe melu mela be nga bo te nguleya ve atinan ya ba.
Guiziga: Samsoŋ a ɓa taŋ: «Mbur mazumo, gwat mazumaka a bo ti vaŋ. Mbur migidaŋ, gwat mideɗeke a bo ti vaŋ. I mike?» Gawlahay a gam hin makir, ko a lumaka ɓi mukicuwula tuwa t'aruŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Samson wi'i ɓe: “Nyaamdu wurtake haa nyaamoojum. Dakam wurtake haa cemmbiɗɗum.” Ɗume ɗum yiɗi wi'go? Haa ragare nyalɗe tati sukaaɓe keɓtaay ko saawi nder annditanamwol man tawon.
Fulfulde_DC: Samson wi'i ɓe: “Nyaamdu wurtake haa nyaamoojum. Dakam wurtake haa cemmbiɗɗum.” Ɗume ɗum yiɗi wi'go? Haa ragare nyalɗe tati sukaaɓe keɓtaay ko saawi nder annditanamwol man tawon.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Samsɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mɔ nɛ‘i nyɔŋ gboo nɛ tɛ wi-nyɔŋ-wi, ɓɛɛ nyɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ gboo nɛ tɛ ŋga-wi.» Zaŋ zɛ taar, o be ŋgaiwi kpa gba̧a̧ sumgba'i na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Samsɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mɔ nɛ‘i nyɔŋ gboo nɛ tɛ wi-nyɔŋ-wi, ɓɛɛ nyɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ gboo nɛ tɛ ŋga-wi.» Zaŋ zɛ taar, o be ŋgaiwi kpa gba̧a̧ sumgba'i na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke sha hɛ: «Ma wəsə kezeme ne, mbe wəndə nya kezeme shave ŋkɛ. Ma wəsə nya zeɗe ne, mbe wəndə nya berete shave ŋkɛ. Wa slə ŋkɛ wa?» Kwetere wəmbəa hɛ mahekene ne, kekemave zhɛne ta ŋkɛ Ka Filisti we.
Tupurri: Se day wii ra so gano: Je maga ree jar mono, fen reege kal le go äil äe, see je ma de eegre no, fen ma desaçy kal le go ni. A joñ wo naw swa'a, saara kaçaç ma äo wer jag joçoçn go gaè.

Francais: Le septième jour, ils dirent à la femme de Samson: "Persuade à ton mari de nous expliquer l'énigme; sinon, nous te brûlerons, toi et la maison de ton père. C'est pour nous dépouiller que vous nous avez invités, sans doute?"
Anglais: And it came to pass on the seventh day, that they said unto Samson's wife, Entice thy husband, that he may declare unto us the riddle, lest we burn thee and thy father's house with fire: have ye called us to take that we have? is it not so?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buurta siɗiyata nisi di tam cata vi Samson ala: Nak ma nilam jufagu kay nam ma duma caw law na'ta goyo, la naɗina nak hiɗi ziyna vi bug noŋ kaf numa min ŋalgi goyo, dolay nigi yuma'ay kayn kay yaw sle ma kuma'an su?
Bulu: E môse zañgbwale be nga jô e minga Samson na: Kele wone nyo nnôm, a kate bia atinan ya ba; nge nalé momo wôna bia ye diʼi wo nduan, womien a ndaa ésoo ése. Nde minga a loone bia na mi mane wôlé bia biôme nga?
Guiziga: Na angi hin mitarnaˀ naŋ muduba na, a ɓaka ngwas ngi Samsoŋ: «Inga ka mi ngi zil ɗik na, ɓa a ɓo ndra ɓi ngi kicuwulo, da kanah ta na, i sa wurukum kuɗup ati hay ngi bunuko keɗeɗe. Ki ziloko ndra na, nga tiɓa ndra gwataya kwa mbrike?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde joweeɗiɗawre ɓe mbi'i debbo Samson: “Ƴoyru gorko ma, haa o waŋginana min ko saawi nder annditanamwol man, to naa non min ngulete, an e saare baaba ma. Malla on ewni min ngam haa on ngartira min talaka'en?”
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde joweeɗiɗawre ɓe mbi'i debbo Samson: “Ƴoyru gorko ma, haa o waŋginana min ko saawi nder annditanamwol man, to naa non min ngulete, an e saare baaba ma. Malla on ewni min ngam haa on ngartira min talaka'en?”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ kóò ko Samsɔŋ: «Mɛ̀ ɔ́r wíì kɔ-mɛ, ha̧ a̧ mɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ sumgba'i h’ɛ́ɛ́. Kà bó hegɔ na, ɛɛ tɛ dɔ mɛ in o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ a nù. Ɛnɛ saa yɛ tɛnɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kai mɔ er yɛ nde?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ kóò ko Samsɔŋ: «Mɛ̀ ɔ́r wíì kɔ-mɛ, ha̧ a̧ mɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ sumgba'i h’ɛ́ɛ́. Kà bó hegɔ na, ɛɛ tɛ dɔ mɛ in o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ a nù. Ɛnɛ saa yɛ tɛnɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kai mɔ er yɛ nde?»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwa mberefaŋe ta hɛ ne, ma ke hɛ sha male ta Samson: «Geze nda ghena zeɗe ke za ŋa baŋe ŋkɛ kancɛte n'yɛ ghena nya mbe ghena ta ŋkɛ, keɗema ŋkɛ kala nyagha ne, pɛtɛ teteremte ŋayɛ n'yɛ le mbelia ŋa. Kezha fəmte pɛtɛa wəshi yitea ghen'yɛ nda hekakɛ n'yɛ yɛ na?»
Tupurri: Ti naw ma de renamn mono, saara kal wii waçy Samsoñ gano: Ndal war äo de tawgi nen maga aà mo naa wer jag joçoçn go ne wuuri. Bay wa no, wuur roë nday go de tiñ mani pan äo no. Nday ëe wuur le ma äo coo wuur go ga pa ge?

Francais: La femme de Samson pleurait auprès de lui et disait : "Tu n'as pour moi que de la haine, et tu me m'aimes pas. Tu as proposé une énigme aux fils de mon peuple, et tu ne me l'as pas expliquée !" Il lui répondit : "Je ne l'ai expliquée ni à mon père ni à ma mère, et je te l'expliquerais !"
Anglais: And Samson's wife wept before him, and said, Thou dost but hate me, and lovest me not: thou hast put forth a riddle unto the children of my people, and hast not told it me. And he said unto her, Behold, I have not told it my father nor my mother, and shall I tell it thee?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Cata vi Samson tiy talam hiɗi zimiyna, ka dum ala: Naŋ dolay minanɗi, nan kiraŋ bisi, naŋ di law ta zulda mi sumuna vanu may naŋ min danti cawa' goyɗin kay mige? Nam hota' dita: Bun hiɗi sun kaw nan may disi caw law na'taɗi, may nan as dag law na'ta mag nak da su?
